name: Absolute Fury
description: Caster enhances the targets with the strength of earth. Willing targets receive a placed roll on all PWR, STR, and AGI checks, gain a 4 + 1/4F bonus martial points, and all evocations are automatically finessed twice in a direction of the caster's choosing for free.

name: Adaptation
description: Caster morphs their body, taking on new traits. Specifically, the caster can allow themselves to take on any number of Fauna Adaptations - though these do not reduce the damage they take from effects, unless specifically stated. Caster can use this as a part of any other transformation listed in the Fauna group without focus or action cost. These adaptations require HEA to utilize.

name: Amorphous Weapon
description: Drawing raw destructive force out of their chest, the caster forces it to coalesce around their hands, extending outwards in the shape of a weapon. Caster can instead choose to manifest this weapon and bind it to another target; allowing them to use the weapon. Changing the form of the weapon has no action cost. It can become any basic weapon; additionally, the wielder of the weapon gains 3 bonus martial points and 3 stacking ranks in every weapon specialization and combat style.

name: Anchor
description: A wave of ectoplasmic energy engulfs the targets, AGI check to negate. The targets are placed at the bottom of the initiative order, arranged as the caster chooses, they do not gain more turns if they have already taken turns. For the spell's duration, all attack rolls against the targets gain 2 + 1/4F placed rolls. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action. Ending this spell does not return the targets to their original place in the initiative order.

name: Alter Fate
description: Caster rolls up to (Rank/2) dice of any size and records each die's result to form a dice pool. When a character within 60' LOS of the caster makes a roll, the caster may expend a die from the pool to substitute that die for one of the dice in the roll. Unwilling targets get a WIL save to prevent their rolls from being modified. \nThis spell cannot be recast until the completion of a rest period, and only one instance of it can be active at a time. Dice from the pool may only be used to substitute dice of equal size.

name: Adjust Gravity
description: Targets of this spell suffer no damage from falling. Should the spell ends before the target(s) finish falling, they start falling at the normal rate and take damage appropriate for falling the remaining distance. Upon activation of the spell, targets can apply the following adjustment to themselves \nHave the rate at which they fall slowed down to 50' - 10'/F (min 10') per round. \nHave the rate at which they fall increased by 50' + 10'/F (min 10') per round.

name: Arcane Death
description: Caster launches an antimagic sphere at a single target. The target's mana pool is set to 0 and all active magical effects on the target expire, WIL save to negate.

name: Arcane Battery
description: Caster taps into the primal ley-lines that bind all energy in the universe together, increasing their unit pool by (Rank * 2.) The mana provided by this ability is considered part of the caster's natural unit pool.

name: Arcane Grip
description: Caster can forcibly manipulate an area using their will from up to (Rank * 5)' away. Caster can use their core action to exert their will upon an object, manipulating these objects from afar. When using their will in such a way, they cannot perform attacks or manipulate anything more than (Rank *3) pounds.

name: Arcane Orbital
description: Caster creates 3 + 1/2F Orbitals (Astral Power - 2) and may move all orbitals at once as a Swift Action at a speed of 30' + 10'/F per round. The orbitals may move anywhere in the LOS; when utilizing these orbitals the caster forgoes all somatic and verbal components of their spells.

name: Artifact
description: A ball of vicious energy erupts at the target location. The ball has 15 HP, 14/14 armor DVs (0/0 Movement DVs), and automatically makes a ranged attack roll directed at the nearest target hostile to the caster at the end of each of the caster's turns (As long as they are within 40' of the artifact.) On hit, the ranged attack roll inflicts 2 + 1/2F d8 Pure_Magic damage.

name: Arcane Shield
description: Several shields appear, protecting willing targets from attacks. This spell grants the targets' 4 + 1/2F to their shield DVs in addition to providing them a temporary barrier that absorbs 35 + 5/F damage. The arcane shield is active until the end of the caster's next turn.

name: Aspect
description: Caster's physical form is replaced with that of their effigy. All of the following values are set to that of the effigy: Movespeed, DV's, physical size/appearance, Resistances, Susceptibilities, Immunities, replications and vulnerabilities. Caster also gains access to any abilities the effigy knows (spells and skills).

name: Arcane Pull
description: Caster pulls all targets against the flow of gravity, forcing them 120' in a direction of the caster's choice (such as upwards), AGI save to negate. If there is a collision, the target will receive a d12 of adaptive damage for every 10' they are forcibly moved. Targets start falling at the start of their next turn. Sufficiently small buildings will receive a STR check to remain in the ground. Larger structures will not have to make the check.

name: Assert Order
description: A mark of the caster's choice appears above a willing target for the spell's duration. When a resistance check or save that inflicts damage targets them, they may add 3 + 1/2F up to 2 + 1/2F times to the die roll before the mark and spell expires. All uses count, even if they are not resisted.

name: Assemble
description: The caster transforms a mundane material, such as dirt, into an item. The item can be up to the size of a 5' x 5' x 5' cube. The item is as sturdy as iron, appears to be magical, and cannot replicate anything more advanced than an analog watch.

name: Attunement
description: Magical energy surrounds the hands of the caster as they reach out and temporarily alter the effigy, allowing them to realign all of its attributes and characteristics, though these changes are only active for the duration, at which point the effigy returns to its previous state.

name: Assert Life
description: A mark of the caster's choice appears above all targets for the spell's duration. Targets become subject to the following affects: \nAll living targets regain 6 + 1/F d10 HP. Any excess HP is converted into a temporary HP barrier that lasts for 1 minute . The barrier absorbs the pool's worth of damage before breaking, all remaining damage continuing as normal. \nIf undead, the targets receive 12 + 2/F d10 divine damage, AGI save for half.

name: Avatar
description: Caster generates a magical divine apparition, becoming resistant to divine damage in the process. As long as the avatar is active, the caster can utilize their swift action to cast any spell from the Life group with an action cost of a core action. Causing a target to recover HP while Avatar is active also confers the benefits of Assert Order (Life -1) to them.

name: Backlash
description: For this spell's duration, when the caster is targeted by or starts a turn under the effect of a spell cast by another creature, the caster of that spell suffers 2 + 1/2F d20 adaptive damage. Backlash does not distinguish between enemies and allies.

name: Avalanche
description: Caster conjures a mess of rapidly moving snow. As a Swift Action, caster may move the avalanche up to 30' along the ground within range of the spell. On collision, the avalanche grapples and inflicts 5 + 1/Fd10 ice damage at the end of each of the caster's turn, AGI or STR check to negate (target's choice.) Characters must make a grapple check to break.

name: Balance
description: A shockwave of pure energy descends upon the targets, they are stripped of lightning, fire, force, and ice resistance, or elemental resistance should they have any, HEA save to negate.

name: Banish
description: The target is sent back to its native plane - receding to an equivalent location, WIL save to negate. Should the target fail, they may not return to the plane of banishment for 1 + 1/F hours. This spell cannot affect targets native to the plane they are on.

name: Bastion of Dawn
description: A sigil is affixed to the target, creating a 30 + 5/F temporary HP barrier. This spell provides 4 + 1/4F bonus DVs until broken. When a resistance check or save that targets them, they gain a placed roll as long as the barrier persists.

name: Baleful Betrayal
description: Caster magically warps the target's sense of friend and foe, WIL check to negate. When the target attempts to target a character with an attack, spell, or another effect, the caster can spend a reaction to direct the attack at one of the target's allies within range. After this, the target can immediately re-attempt the WIL check without action cost.

name: Binding
description: Caster must make a melee attack roll to touch a target - upon a successful touch attack, the target is pinned until the end of their next turn, pulsing magical chains wrapping around them.

name: Bladeleaf Aura
description: 5 + 1/F plants spring up defensively around a target, moving with them. Should they be hit by an attack with an attack roll, one of these plants interposes and sacrifices themselves. If it is a single target offensive spell, 2 of the plants can sacrifice themselves for the target. The plants wither when hit no matter how much damage is done to them. Only one instance of this spell can be active on a target at any given time.

name: Bend Elements
description:
Caster manifests elemental power around them. The number of effects that the caster can do simultaneously is equal to (Rank/2). Caster may select from the following effects: 
Produce minor, non-damaging elemental effects, such as leaving a trail of energy as footprints, or forcing their eyes to glow. 
Shift easily moveable objects in the area, such as unlocked doors, leaves, and curtains. 
Casually manipulate objects less than (Rank) pounds with air, though they cannot make attacks with this effect. 
Inflict slight temperature changes, warming themselves up or cooling themselves down

name: Blessing of Creation
description: Caster touches a number of targets, granting them a shield that blocks 16 + 4/F damage, but allows all remaining damage to continue onto the target. As long as this shield remains active targets gain a placed roll on WIL, AGI, and HEA resistance checks/saves.

name: Blightfall
description: Caster shifts the flow of life and magical energies into a miasma. For every 5' of movement within the area, targets gain an instance of Rot ( 1 + rank/5d4 blight damage for each instance) and immediately receive the effects for their current instances of rot. If a target would be given more than 5 instances as a result of this spell, they instead gain the caster's choice of a Curse spell the caster knows.

name: Blinding Furor
description: As a reaction to an enemy attempting to strike the caster in melee reach, the caster strikes back with a blinding flash of light, blinding the target until the start of their next turn, HEA save to negate; causing their current and all further attacks by the target to suffer the blindness penalty.

name: Blind
description: Brilliant light fills the area for the duration - blinding all, HEA check to negate. The light functions similarly to magical darkness, though the sensory overload renders all means of sight impossible. Targets continue to be blinded, even outside of the radius should they fail the HEA check. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Bend Presence
description: Caster coats themselves in a mind-altering magical aura that wipes the memories of anyone who views them and replaces themselves with a nondescript figure, WIL save to negate. After this spell ends, those who witness the aura have 5 + 5/F minutes worth of memory before and after wiped, leaving the targets with only vague recollections of the figure. For two finnesses, the caster can instead choose to be remembered as another figure, instead of wiping the memories.

name: Blink
description: Caster fades away in a manner of their choice, teleporting up to their current movement somewhere else in their LOS.

name: Black Hole
description: Caster enhances themselves or an orbital with cosmic energy, drawing all targets in a 20' radius towards the caster or orbital. Targets that collide with the caster or orbital receive 2 + 1 /2F d20 adaptive damage, lose their movement action, and are dragged wherever the caster or orbital moves along their path, STR check to negate the pull and halve the damage. This pulling effect is continuously active for the spell's duration. Affected targets may reattempt the STR check with their core action on subsequent rounds.

name: Brainfreeze
description: Caster creates a magical frost that settles on the target's head, causing them distress and slowing mental faculties, HEA check to negate. Targets activate thought-activated magic items, effects, or spells which cost a Swift Action with a Core Action instead and lose their reactions for the duration of the spell. Affected targets automatically re-attempt the check at the end of their turn.

name: Blur
description: Caster temporarily bends the space around themselves, allowing them to avoid immediate and future attacks. Until the start of their next turn, the caster gains 3 + 1/F shield DVs.

name: Blizzard
description: A furious snowstorm descends in a 30' + 10'/F area for 4 + 2/F rounds, limiting LOS to 10' within it; ending a turn within it inflicts 4 + 1/F d12 ice damage and slows the target, HEA save for half damage.

name: Butterfly / Raven
description: Caster transforms into an Astral Wanderer or Strygarii.

name: Chain Lightning
description: Caster fires a massive arc of lightning from their fingertips towards a target. Chain lightning inflicts 7 + 1/2F d20 lightning damage, HEA save for half - jumping to a new target of the caster's choice within 20' of the original target should they fail the save. The chain repeats itself until the caster ends it, or the HEA save is successfully made; in all cases, the lightning cannot jump back to targets that have already been struck.

name: Chaos Bolt
description: Caster makes a ranged attack roll, launching a bolt of pure chaotic energy at 1 + 1/2F targets, inflicting a random chaos effect on hit.

name: Bluefield
description: Until the start of the caster's next turn, all physical projectiles colliding with the target area are suspended in time - causing them to lose all momentum. At the start of their next turn, the caster immediately fires each of the projectiles at a target within 60' without action cost, making a ranged attack roll for each projectile. A projectile fired in this way inflicts the damage die of the weapon it was fired from. Projectiles that are not fired fall harmlessly to the ground.

name: Chaos Control
description: Twisting chaos into a powerful force, caster grants the effects of Primordial Sphere (Turmoil - 0) to 4 + 2/F targets; while also removing any active chaos effects, HEA save to negate both effects. Caster determines what resistance is given upon casting. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Chaos Curse
description: Chaotic energy surrounds the targets, undermining their senses, WIL save to negate. Whenever the target attempts to make an attack roll or cast a spell, roll a d6. On a result of 4-6, the caster may choose a new target for that attack or spell by expending a reaction. The spell is still treated as though the target cast it. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Celestial Sphere
description: Caster creates an unstable 10' radius ball of prismatic light that hovers above the ground and moves up to 30' per round, either in a straight line or where the caster designates (spending their swift action); in either movement style - it moves through anything it shares a space with and continues movement unless forcibly stopped by a reflective surface (bouncing back in a random direction 10' before resuming movement) or another Celestial Sphere (both spheres bouncing off each other in random directions 10' before resuming movement.) When the sphere moves through an ally it grants them the effects of Divine Dawn (Light - 2) and they are immune to blindness until the end of their next turn; when it moves through an enemy (AGI save to skirt the sphere) they are blinded and are targeted by Reflection (Light - 7.) At any time during movement the caster may stop the sphere as a reaction, when the sphere is stopped or destroyed (by this or any other effect) it goes critical and bursts as a 10' radius AoE inflicting 5d20 divine damage, AGI save for half damage.

name: Chaos Shield
description: In reaction to being struck by an attack roll, the caster strikes back with a brilliant flash of energy. The target takes 3 + 1/F d12 chaotic damage and is targeted by a chaos effect (lasting 1 + 1/F days), HEA save for half damage and to negate the chaos effect.

name: Chaos Inversion
description: Reaching out towards the essence of the target, caster exchanges what languages and origin skills are known between themselves and the target, caster loses access to any languages and origin skills they currently have and gain whatever languages and origins skills the target has for the duration of the spell. This can instead be used on a written or electronic document to scramble it beyond any recognition, by forcing the document to randomly alternate between the grammatical and written intricacies of the languages they comprise. This can be used on non-sentient targets.

name: Cloak of Snow
description: Caster covers the willing target in a thick layer of elemental energy, damaging other targets within 10' + 5'/2F of them for 2 + 1/4F d10 ice damage at the end of their turn. This spell also grants the target ice resistance.

name: Cloak of Sparks
description: Caster covers the willing target in a thick layer of elemental energy, damaging other targets within 10' + 5'/2F of them for 2 + 1/4F d10 fire damage at the end of their turn. This spell also grants the target fire resistance.

name: Celestial Alignment
description:
Caster touches a number of willing targets within one size category of themselves, and all of their bodies merge into one. This merger physically alters their body so that you appear as a mixed version of the participants. Affected targets decide what equipment is absorbed into the fused being and what equipment remains available for use. These fused items are restored once the spell ends. For the duration, the caster's body and that of all of the target's are effectively one and the same, and together they share one turn, though all except the caster lose their movement action. All fusees can communicate telepathically. All are aware of each other's surface thoughts, knowledge, or memories of each other, but can purposefully conceal anything not at the forefront of their consciousnesses. For the duration, targets: 
Have the combined maximum hit points/mana and remaining hit point/MUs of each fusee. 
Can make any attribute check, attack roll, or skill check using the highest available modifier. 
Can use all abilities and spells of the fusees, except for those they purposefully conceal from others. 
Individuals maintain their personal action sets and cannot make use of another's archetype 
At any time, fusees can use their reaction or swift action to end this spell early. When the spell ends: 
The targets reappear in an unoccupied space of the caster's choice within 5 feet of the fusion, and their bodies return to normal. If there is insufficient space, the targets are magically forced through whatever physical matter is blocking its reappearance in the shortest possible path to an open space, before reappearing in that space 
All equipment on each fusee that was absorbed in the transformation is returned to its original positions on its original owners. 
Remaining HP/mana are evenly split between all fusees up to their normal maximum. 
Any conditions, diseases, or similar effects that were afflicting the targets before the fusion are returned to them as appropriate. Any such effects gained during the fusion are retained only by the caster. 
Celestial Alignment consumes the focus of all involved, though they can continue casting focus spells if they are able to maintain more than one. Using this spell on an effigy does not count towards utilized focus.

name: Cloak of Stone
description: Caster covers the willing target in a thick layer of elemental energy, damaging other targets within 10' + 5'/2F of them for 2 + 1/4F d10 force damage at the end of their turn. This spell also grants the target force resistance.

name: Cloak of Storms
description: Caster covers the willing target in a thick layer of elemental energy, damaging other targets within 10' + 5'/2F of them for 2 + 1/4F d10 lightning damage at the end of their turn. This spell also grants the target lightning resistance.

name: Chaos Incarnate
description:
Chaotic forces coalesce to protect the target. At the casting of the spell, roll 1d4. Apply an effect to the target according to the result from this table; lasts until the start of the target's next turn: 
1: Until the start of their next turn, the target is immune to mundane damage 
2: Until the start of their next turn, the target is immune to elemental damage 
3: At the start of each of their turns; target gains a 40 HP barrier 
4: Attack rolls against the target suffer two displaced rolls and they receive two placed rolls to all saves and resistance checks.

name: Cloudburst
description: All of the caster's strikes burst on impact sending out a wave of nimbus clouds. The clouds cover a 10' radius around those attacked and persist for the duration of the spell. Any target in a cloud, save for the caster, is considered susceptible to lightning. Additionally, any attacks directed against a target in a cloud have 1 + 2/F placed rolls. The target of the character's attacks take full damage, while all other targets within 10' of the bursts also take an equal amount of lightning damage; this may include the user. All targets struck by the AOE get a single AGI save to halve the damage.

name: Cinderflame
description: Caster produces a blast of black smoke flecked with live cinders, igniting targets acting within the cloud. Each time a target takes any actions within the cloud, they receive 3 + 1/F d12 fire damage, with a HEA save for half. The cinders incinerate the armor of those inside, burning away 3 + 1/2F armor DVs each time they fail the save (Any damage inflicted by the cinders must be repaired before the armor can provide the same level of benefit.)

name: Collapse
description: Caster twists the energies affecting the target against them. The target receives a number of d12s in adaptive damage equivalent to the number of status conditions, continuous, and focus spells they are being affected by, HEA save for half damage.

name: Confusing Darkness
description: Caster creates a veil of heavy, magical darkness over the area. Manipulative apparitions lap away at the minds of the targets, confusing them should they end their turn in the area, WIL save to negate. This lasts until the end of the character's next turn or until they leave the area.

name: Comet
description: Caster harnesses an immense amount of magical energy - it coalesces around them in a massive sphere that engulfs them. The caster then unleashes a comet from their fingertips. Those struck by the comet receive 6 + 1/2F d20 fire damage, with a HEA or AGI (target's choice) save for half damage and to negate being knocked prone. The comet's impact inflicts heavy damage to terrain, potentially destroying buildings and leaving a crater.

name: Compulsion
description: The caster hijacks the target's mind and can expend their reaction to grant the target another Core Action, WIL check to negate. What the target does with this Core Action may be decided by the caster. The affected target will believe the action they take is of their own volition. After each time this happens, the target immediately re-attempts the initial check at no action cost.

name: Cosmic Lance
description: A jet of energy erupts from the casters fingers in the shape of an object of choice. The caster makes a ranged attack roll, inflicting 2 + 1/F d12 adaptive damage on hit.

name: Copycast
description: This spell is used as a reaction to an attempt to cast another spell. The caster copies the exact effects of the spell onto another target or point.

name: Corona
description: Caster converts any damage that is inflicted upon them into raw energy, sustaining the injury but gaining a pool of magical force. For every 6 minus 1/2F damage the caster suffers, they add 1d8 to their next attack roll, of any damage type the attack can inflict. Stored damage decays at the rate of 6 each round. Stored damage is expended upon making the empowered attack.

name: Counterspell
description: This spell is used as a reaction to an attempt to cast another spell. If the targeted spellcaster loses a contested WIL check against the caster, the spell does not go off.

name: Creeping Consumption
description: Vines shoot down the throats of targets in the area, stunning them, HEA check to negate. Affected targets automatically re-attempt at the end of their turn.

name: Create Water
description: Caster fills a container with water sufficient to provide enough potable water for most creatures to survive for a day. Water can also be created within the lungs of a target inflicting 2 + 1/F d10 stress damage to them, HEA save for half damage.

name: Crystal Mirrors
description: Caster creates a storm of snow and ice that surrounds the boundaries of the area. Caster creates 2 + 1/2F mirrors adjacent to each target, generating half as many mirrors on a successful WIL save. A mirror has 70 + 10/F HP, 5 DVs, and is immune to non-damaging effects. The mirror shares damage dealt to it to whomever it depicts until it breaks (damage is not shared when targets attack their mirrors.)

name: Current
description: Caster manifests a stream of water in the air. The stream can be oriented any which way within the area so long as it is a straight line. The water in the current halves movement DVs, rid's affected targets of their movement action, and carries those within it 40'+ 10'/F, STR check to negate the loss of their movement action and the halving of their movement DV's. The caster can change the direction of the current as a swift action. The current itself does not move, only those within it. Individuals in the current may re-attempt the check as a swift action.

name: Cosmic Force
description:
Caster channels cosmic energies to infuse their next 2 + 1/2F spells with celestial power. The next time that target casts an evocation or continuous spell, the spell gains the following effects: 
The spell receives 2 + 1/2F free fineses and may be finessed 4 times past the original cap. 
The spell's damage dice cannot be below half its maximum if it is rolled for less it is treated as having rolled half its possible max dice result. 
The spell's resist check cannot be below half its maximum; if it is rolled for less it is treated as having rolled half its possible max dice result.

name: Curse of Knowledge
description: Caster magically marks targets with a curse that warps and attacks the mind, WIL save to negate. Whenever the targets cast a spell they receive 2d10 Blight damage and lose several mana equal to the curse's rank.

name: Curse of Lethargy
description: Caster magically marks a target with a curse that causes a rejection between the body and soul, WIL save to negate. The target is no longer capable of making attack rolls and receives an instance of Rot for every 5' they move. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Curse of Sleep
description: Targets have their unconsciousness threshold altered, WIL save to negate. Instead of falling unconscious at 0, they will instead fall unconscious at 25% + 5%/F of their HP, though any further damage taken below this threshold while the target is awake will immediately awaken the target, unless they are below 0 HP.

name: Curse of Steel
description: Caster magically marks a target with a curse that causes a rejection between the body and weapon; whenever the target makes a weapon attack, they take damage equal to half that weapon's die size (ex. 1d20 inflicts 10) as Blight damage, WIL save to negate. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Curseplague
description: Lashing out at the essence of the targets, the blight in their bodies combusts, inflicting them with the caster's choice of a Curse Spell they know, as long as the number instances of rot they have is equal to or less than the rank of the curse spell. All instances of Rot are consumed upon activation of this spell.

name: Crystal Scales
description: A crystalline, scale-like coat covers the target for the duration of the spell, or until the armor breaks. This armor grants a willing target 4 + 1/2F bonus DVs and 6 instances of mundane damage reduction. The armor blocks all damage until it has taken 40 + 8/F damage, at which point it breaks - no longer providing a benefit (breaking naturally at the end of the duration.) Upon breaking, an explosion radiates around the caster - causing all, excluding the target to receive 4 + 1/F d12 force damage in a 10' radius.

name: Dark Echo
description: Caster inscribes a 10' x 10' symbol onto the ground beneath them. Over the duration of the ability, the caster can expend their swift action to return to the symbol or return whatever is on top of the symbol to them. If whatever is lying atop the symbol is unwilling, they have a WIL save to negate

name: Darken
description:
Caster manifests darkness within the physical world. The number of effects that the caster can do simultaneously is equal to (Rank/2). Caster may select one of the following effects: 
A small fire, candle, or other light source is snuffed out. 
Easily moveable objects in the area such as unlocked doors, leaves, and curtains, all move to create shade within a 5' radius. 
Natural shadows appear in a 5' radius for the next minute.

name: Darkport
description: All willing targets disappear in a flash of darkness, before reappearing at another target location - though the target location must be shrouded in darkness.

name: Curse of Death
description: Caster reaches out towards the essence of an unconscious or dead (that has died within the last week) target, animating their body, WIL save to negate (The body must attempt the save, regardless of being able to take actions.) The body continues to function until destroyed, and the caster can command the affected targets with a swift action to perform a core action and its movement action. If directed using the caster’s core action, it gains access to its movement, core, reaction, and swift actions or the caster gives all presently affected targets a movement and core action. Caster may gather information from the target, though depending on the state of the body, their mind may have deteriorated too much to be useful.  The caster may command the body to use any ability it had access to in life.

name: Deathplague
description: Plague spores erupt from a target, inflicting 1 + 1/4F d10 Blight damage to them and all characters in a 10' radius around them. All targets in the 10' radius (including the original) receive instances of Rot equal to the number on the original target, HEA save to negate the spread of rot, if applicable.

name: Daze
description: Target loses (Rank) memloc'd locations, loses grip of any active focus spells it is maintaining, and is befuddled for 1 + (Rank/5) rounds, WIL save to negate. Resisting this effect allows the target to automatically succeed on saves against Daze for the next 4 rounds.

name: Delay
description: This spell is used as a reaction to an attempt to cast another spell. If the target loses in a contested WIL check against the caster, the spell fizzles and is nullified. The spell will return to reality at the end of the caster's next 1 + 1/2F turns, going to the same location - offending spells will treat any target at the location as the new target.

name: Deflection
description: The caster surrounds themselves with a reflective aura until the start of their next turn. After a creature misses an attack roll against the target, the creature is forced to roll to attack itself with the same amount of energy. Attacks made against oneself ignore Movement DVs.

name: Dark Bastion
description: Caster manifests darkness into a small pocket dimension, creating a 2鈥 diameter ball of black, rubbery material. At any point during the duration of this spell, whoever holds the ball may open up a single 4' radius portal as Swift Action; the portal may also be closed as a Swift Action. Only one portal may be open at a time; opening a new portal closes the old one. Within the portal is a dark, empty, dome shaped room with a radius of 25'. At the end of the duration, the room starts slowly collapsing and all objects within the room are gently expelled.

name: Cyclone
description: Caster weaves a cyclone of water and air that moves across the battlefield. The cyclone has a movement speed of 20'. The caster may command the cyclone to move as a swift action. The cyclone will continue moving in a direction until it receives commands to stop. Anyone caught in the cyclone receives 2 + 1/2F d6 blunt damage and is swept into the cyclone - losing their movement action while inside, AGI check to negate both effects. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action, immediately regaining their movement action upon breaking free.

name: Demolish
description: Metals from the ground move to the caster's arm, strengthening their punch but making their control unwieldy. The caster can make a melee attack roll against an object (such as a building) or a target with a displaced roll - inflicting 6 + 1/2F d20 force damage on a successful strike, and rendering any armor worn by the target unusable until it is repaired. This damage is doubled against buildings.

name: Destructive Verdance
description: Plants in the area become animated, attacking all targets, inflicting 4 + 1/2F d10 piercing damage each turn they begin in the area, AGI save for half.

name: Direct Light
description: Caster must announce this spell before any other actions taking place on this round, losing their swift action on their turn when casting. Caster can choose to direct all willing targets in the area to fire upon a single target. All ranged weapons and spells with attack rolls gain 1d12 bonus divine damage and a placed roll when targeting the individual determined by the caster, until the start of the caster's next turn.

name: Delve
description: The caster gains a series of visions about the target's life, revealing the most intense events of the past 7 + 2/F days, proceeding backward from the moment, WIL save to negate. More emotionally intense memories are more clear to the caster, and once viewed, these memories are treated as the caster's for other spell effects.

name: Disguise
description: Caster changes the target's appearance to another of their choosing. The spell may make the target appear up to one foot shorter or taller. The spell cannot produce dramatic changes such as making a humanoid target non-humanoid and vice versa. The illusion does not hold up to physical interaction. This disguise is an illusion and is subject to illusion detection rules.

name: Disordered Alignment
description: Chaotic energies violently attempt to fuse the targets, sending them both to an isolated but safe 80' radius area in the plane of chaos, causing them to share 1 + 1/F year's worth of random memory, and to become immediately hostile to one another for the duration, WIL save to negate all effects. The caster must always be one of the targets, and all targets are returned to the location they were in previously, or the nearest safe location.

name: Direction
description: When in turn by turn mode, the effigy must be directed using either a swift or core action. If directed by a swift action - the effigy gains access to it's core action and its movement action. If directed using the caster's core action it gains access to its movement, core, reaction, and swift actions or the caster gives all present effigies a movement and core action. This can only ever be used once each turn per effigy, and the effigy acts independently from the caster once outside of the area.

name: Dispersal
description: Caster slams the ground - a wave of wind emanating outwards from the point of impact, blowing all targets 60' backwards, knocking them prone, and inflicting 6 + 1/F d12 blunt damage to them with a AGI or STR save (Target's choice) for half damage and to negate being knocked back and prone. 3d6 additional blunt damage may be taken if targets are knocked into a solid structure.

name: Dispel
description: 1 + 1/2F target spell effects end, WIL save by the effect's caster to negate. Targets must always attempt to resist this spell. Permanent effects are only suppressed for up to one hour on a failed save.

name: Divine Strike
description: Caster fills their weapon with latent energy - making an attack roll against a target (with two placed rolls when against blinded targets.) On a successful strike, the caster inflicts 6 + 1/F d12 divine damage in addition to the weapon's base damage on hit.

name: Displacement Orb
description: A glob of energy fires from the caster's fingertips, sapping the energy of everything around. Those impacted by the orb lose 2 + 1/4F d10 mana and have their focus disrupted, WIL save to negate. These mana can be recovered normally via a rest period.

name: Divine Dawn
description: Caster releases a burst of radiant energy that enhances allies and weakens enemies. Chosen willing targets gain a placed roll on their next attack roll and unwilling targets are blinded until the start of the caster's next turn, WIL save to negate.

name: Dust to Dust
description: Caster warps the flow of life energy around them until it is a howling black mist that wipes away every trace of anything it kills. Targets receive 2 instances of Suffering (Blight) for each instance of rot they have. They cannot remove the Suffering condition while affected by a curse spell.

name: Earth Shield
description: Caster manipulates existing stone, earth, or similar substances to create a mobile shield between the target and others. This shield has a HP pool of 8 + 5/F HP. This effect breaks LOS between the target and others; this barrier does not inhibit the wielder's LOS to others.

name: Effervescence
description: An aqueous aura surrounds the target's body. This spell is cast in reaction to the caster or a nearby target being hit by a source of elemental or magic damage, reducing the damage to the target by half.

name: Earth Tunnel
description: Caster gains a burrowing speed equal to a quarter of their movement speed. Caster can finesse the spell twice to have the opening close up behind them as they move. Burrowing speed is affected by the materials being burrowed through.

name: Ebb and Flow
description: Wisps of energy fly from the caster towards the indicated location. All targets chosen by the caster in the radius may immediately succeed at any resistance check/save they re-attempt during their turn. In addition, the targets recover 6 + 1/F d10 HP.

name: Energy Conversion
description: Caster enhances a willing target with a layer of magical energy. The target has a placed roll on resistances checks/saves stemming from their choice of divine, fire, force, ice, Pure_Magic, or lightning damage types, 1/2F to select additional damage types. Should the associated check/save be made - the rolled damage is stored as a barrier for the target and they suffer no damage from the ability.

name: Empowered Effigy
description: Strands of energy wrap into the effigy's form as it loses its susceptibility and vulnerabilities for 4 + 2/F Rounds. The effigy is restored to its maximum HP and can take an extra Core and Movement Action.

name: Doppleganger
description: Caster creates an Illusory copy of themselves - though this copy has a few unique properties. The caster can choose to switch positions with the copy as a Swift Action by expending 2 mana. The caster can choose to make their strikes and spells originate from the copy instead of themselves, effectively extending their range. The copy's HP is equal to half of the caster's and has the same DVs. The caster can direct the copy to move up to 60' as a swift action. The copy dissipates if it leaves a 120' +20'/F LOS area around the caster.

name: Entangle
description: Caster uses plants in the area in an attempt to pin all who begin their turn in the radius, AGI check to negate. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Energy Reset
description: An overwhelming rush of energy floods into the area, causing the duration of all active continuous and focus spells expires, WIL save to negate. The caster regains 1 mana for each individual spell that expires through the usage of Energy Reset, so long as the expired spells had a mana cost.

name: Energy Transfer
description: Caster's essence reaches out towards up to 3 + 1/F willing targets, re-distributing their magical energies as they see fit. Caster may freely rearrange the mana pools of the targets, though a single target's maximum mana cannot exceed their normal maximum.

name: Emotional Trickery
description: Caster delves into the mind of a target and summons an illusory copy of the person or thing that relates to a chosen emotion or feeling the most, WIL save to negate. The illusion can move anywhere in the LOS as part of any usage of this spell. The illusion can have the sensations of sight, smell, touch, hearing, and taste. If the emotion is love, it shall be what they desire. If it is sorrow, it shall be what brings them sorrow; with four finesses the illusory copy is completely real to the target. Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Swift Action during all later turns, the caster can direct this illusion to frighten or convince the target until the end of their next turn as a Swift Action. If the target is frightened, they are frightened of the caster.

name: Eye of the Storm
description: In response to another character's movement action, the caster can imprison them behind raging winds causing them to lose their movement action this turn, their choice of an STR or AGI save to negate.

name: Fade
description: Caster fades out of reality, their body turning to dust as it scatters. They then instantly teleport to another location within their target line of sight.

name: Eternal Darkness
description: Magical darkness spreads outwards from the chosen point, inflicting 4 + 1/2F d12 stress damage, WIL save for half. If the areas of Shadow Slick, Confusing Darkness, Shadowflash, or Stifling Darkness overlap with this spell's area, they extend to cover this spell's area as well.

name: Favor of the Wind
description: Willing targets within one size category of the caster may be forcibly shifted 10' + 5'/2F in a direction of the caster's choice. If this is enough to take a character outside of a weapon's reach, range, or area of effect's space, the ability does not affect the character.

name: Fire Control
description:
Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Swift Action during all later turns the caster can use one of the following abilities. Anyone that ends their turn in an area surrounded by this fire gains a stacking instance of fire suffering. 
Suspend, control, and create a volume of fire up to the spell's area and change its shape by moving it 60' + 10'/F per round. 
Use fire to attack a target within the LOS by making a ranged attack roll - inflicting 4 + 1/2F d10 fire damage on hit. 
Blast all targets with flames, firing in a 5' x 20' cone in front of the caster, inflicting 4 + 1/4F d12 fire damage, with an AGI save for half damage.

name: Fireball
description: Caster condenses energy into a single spark that flies to the targeted area. Energy is then violently released, inflicting 8 + 1/F d6 fire damage with a HEA save for half damage. The fireball ignites flammable objects and targets, inflicting an instance of suffering (Fire) to targets that fail the save.

name: Firebolt
description: Caster makes a ranged attack roll, firing an arc of flame from their fingertips inflicting (Rank/2)d10 fire damage to the target on hit.

name: Firelink
description: Blazing chains link all targets to the area with a HEA check to negate, inflicting 3 + 1/F d20 fire damage, and burning away 3 + 1/2F armor (Any damage inflicted by the flames must be repaired before the armor can provide the same level of benefit) should they end their turn outside of the spell's area of effect. Affected targets can re-attempt with a core action.

name: Erratic Odds
description: Instead of rolling 2d10 on attack rolls, resistance, skill, and attribute checks, the character rolls 1d6, WIL save to negate. On a 4-6, the attack roll/save/skill check is considered a success (If it is reasonable), on a 1-3 it is considered a failure. In the case of resistance check setting, 4-6 sets the resistance check to 25; 1-3 sets the resistance check to 2. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action. This spell cannot be dropped until it's duration expires.

name: Flameburst Epidemic
description: Hellish flames expand outwards from the target point, inflicting 5 + 1/2F d20 fire damage, HEA save for half, and to avoid being marked. Flameburst Epidemic can be cast without mana cost on marked targets, centered on the target, and spreading outwards for the duration of the spell. Casting in this manner consumes the mark. There is nothing that prevents a target from regaining marks.

name: Firepick
description: Caster makes a ranged attack roll, inflicting 1 + 1/2F d10 fire damage if used against a living target. The effect's common usage is carving in solid structures. When utilized, the firepick gives 1 + 2/F placed rolls on crafting checks, given some time, can carve a hole through a door, break a lock, weld, melt metal and even cauterize minor wounds.

name: Flamestorm
description: Caster creates a fiery whirlwind that travels across the battlefield. The storm has a movement speed of 30', and the caster may command the storm to move as a Swift Action. The storm will continue moving in a direction until it receives commands to stop. Anyone caught in the storm must make an AGI check to halve 2 + 1/2F d20 fire damage and negate being knocked prone.

name: Flamespike
description: Caster makes a ranged attack roll against a target. A spire of flame erupts on top of the target inflicting 2 + 1/F d10 fire damage. Being struck by the flame spike inflicts 1 + 1/F instances of suffering (Fire) to the target.

name: Flashbang
description: Caster creates an explosion of energy that leaves those within 20' + 5'/F of the radius blinded and Deafened on a failed HEA check. On a successful check, targets may choose whether they are blinded or Deafened. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action to remove one of the effects.

name: Flash
description: Numerous jolts of lightning fly out from the caster's fingertips. The caster makes 3 + 1/2F ranged attack rolls, inflicting 2d8 lightning damage on each successful strike.

name: Field of Ruin
description:
Caster superheats the ground, causing it to spew earth onto the surface, creating an area of dangerous force terrain. Anyone that falls into the area has the die size of any falling/push damage increased from a d6 a d12. Additionally, the character applies 2 + 1/4F effects to the Field of Ruin. 
Targets selected by the caster do not receive the negative effects while in Field of Ruin, instead, they receive the benefits of Vigor 
Targets selected by the caster do not receive the negative effects while in Field of Ruin, instead, they receive the benefits of Stoneskin 
As a swift action, the character can cast the spell Spiral Spikes (Terramancy -4), originating from any point in the field.

name: Fleetfoot
description: Targets of this spell move more quickly through time, gaining 25' + 5'/F bonus movement speed.

name: Focus Illusion
description: An illusion spell of the caster's choosing remains permanent as long as the caster retains their focus on this spell. The caster may drop the spell at any time as a Swift Action, but this spell and the original ends. This spell functions on Major Illusion, Emotional Trickery, Phantasm, Minor Illusion, or False Reality.

name: Force Illusion
description: A wave of energy enshrouds the area - rendering it illusory. The area loses its physical substance - allowing anyone to harmlessly pass through it. If the surface a character is standing on is affected by Force Illusion, that character has an AGI save to move to a location outside of its effect. This spell does not affect sentient targets.

name: Forcerush
description: As reaction to a target making an attack roll in the area, the caster may contest an attack roll in the target area 4 + 1/2F times. Should the caster roll higher, the attack is negated. This spell lasts until the start of the caster's next turn.

name: Forge Effigy
description: Calling upon either the twisting energies of the universe, their own knowledge, or guile - the caster creates their effigy/effigies. This spell can only be used once every three days, and the effigies' abilities can only be altered once every month.

name: Fate Link
description: Two or more targets become linked together and share effects applied to one or more of them to others in the link; if one of them becomes a target, fails a check or save, or takes damage then it is applied to all in the link (If one becomes a target, they are all targets, if one of them fails a check, they all fail and suffer the consequences, and if one of them takes damage, they all take damage), WIL save to negate being linked. This cannot cause anything to repeat more than once per target. (An AoE does its damage, once, to all in the link but if it hits more than one target in the link it does not repeat its effect more than once.)

name: Forge
description: Caster alters the properties of the weapon, it now deals adaptive damage of the caster's type instead of its regular damage type. This effect reapplies itself at the start of each round, and can only be active on a single weapon at once.

name: Freeze
description: Caster freezes a target, forcing them to make a HEA save to negate being frozen in ice - losing all of their actions. The ice has a HP pool of 100, and 0 + 25/F % damage inflicted onto the ice is transferred to the original target. Upon hitting 0, the ice shatters and the target is no longer frozen. This does not harm the target, and affected targets automatically re-attempt at the end of their turn. Upon breaking, they regain their swift and movement actions.

name: Frame Freeze
description: Caster briefly stops the flow of time for everyone but themselves; no time passes for others, while they take 3 turns in a row, during which the caster can move as normal. The spell ends if one of the actions used during this period affects a creature or object (Other than themselves or what is being worn/carried by them.)

name: Frenzy
description: Caster draws arcane magic from the air, directing it towards willing targets. Willing targets are granted 2 +1/4F bonus martial points and have their spells automatically finessed 1 + 1/4F times in a direction of their choice. Additionally, targets receive a placed roll on all STR checks.

name: Gaseous Form
description: Caster's body and everything they are wearing/holding evaporates into a mist. The mist has 20' + 10'/F flight speed and can only be affected by area of effect abilities. The mist cannot make attacks or form the verbal/somatic components of spells.

name: Forcelock
description: A barrier forms at the target location. It forms into either a wall with dimensions of 30' tall, 30' long and 2'' thick, or into a 15' radius hollow sphere. If the barrier were to annihilate a target by cutting them in half, they are instead pushed onto a side determined by the caster, unless they cannot fit, then they are forced outwards. Anything moving through the barrier on either side loses all momentum and any remaining actions, regaining them at the start of their next turn. They can continue forward in either direction on their next turn. Spells whose collisions interact with the barrier do not affect it, instead, they wrap around it and disperse harmlessly on its surface.

name: Gathering Winds
description: Caster shrouds themselves in air, increasing their movement speed by 50' + 10'/F. Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Swift Action during later rounds, sweeps up anyone they move adjacent to, causing them to lose their movement actions and reactions - as they are forced to follow the whirlwind 10' behind the caster, STR, or AGI check to negate (target's choice.) Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Gathering Storm
description: A symbol of the caster's choice appears over the targets. For every 10' the target moves, they receive 1d8 lightning damage, and the caster builds up a Static Charge for every 10' the target moves. When the caster has built 5 charges they may cast Lightning Bolt as a Swift Action or cast Chain Lightning as a Core Action upon building up 10 charges. These spells do not cost mana when cast this way.

name: Halflight Lance
description: A beam of twilight flies forward, granting targets designated by the caster a 6 + 1/2F d12 barrier (that expires after 1 + 1/F minutes) and inflicting an equal amount of damage as Pure_Magic damage to targets not designated by the caster, HEA save for half.

name: Grappling Darkness
description: Tendrils of darkness fly from the caster's fingertips, attempting to grapple the targets. The caster makes a ranged attack roll against each target, pinning them on hit. As a swift action the caster can pull grappled targets up to 30' closer to themselves while the spell is active. On subsequent rounds affected targets can attempt a STR or AGI check using their swift action to break free.

name: Guiding Light
description: Caster makes a ranged attack roll, firing an arc of light from their fingertips inflicting (Rank/2)d8 Divine damage to the target on hit. The light sticks to the target, negating stealth, invisibility, or any attempt to take cover until the end of the caster's next turn.

name: Hallowed Stance
description: A translucent barrier engulfs the target; when struck by an attack roll they may spend a reaction contest their WIL with the attacker. On success, they negate the damage of that attack. When they negate damage, they can spend a swift action to cause a target within 50' to recover that amount of damage.

name: Hand of Flame
description: Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Swift Action during all later turns, the caster can make a ranged attack roll with a floating hand made of fire (Provided they are within the LOS), inflicting 3 + 1/2F d6 fire damage on hit.

name: Halt Magic
description: Caster blocks the target's ability to transmit magic, forcing them to spend an additional 3 + 1/F mana to cast a spell, WIL save to negate.

name: Harden
description: Caster creates a protective barrier composed of earth and rocks around a willing target, granting them (Rank/2) bonus DVs until the start of the character's next turn.

name: Forceful Winds
area: Object smaller or equal to 4000 lbs
description:
Caster gains the ability to move or manipulate targets with the force of air. Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a core action during all later turns the caster can grip a target, STR check to negate. The caster can shift their grip to a different target on each of their turns, though they may only grip up to 1 + 1/2F targets at once. As a swift action, the caster can do the following to all gripped targets. 
Move them 60' in any direction, inflicting 4d10 blunt damage on collision though the effect immediately ends upon leaving the LOS. 
Carefully and forcefully manipulate inanimate objects. The caster can make ranged attack rolls with these objects, inflicting 3 + 1/2F d12 piercing, blunt, or edged damage (As appropriate) on hit. 
While held by the caster's grip, the targets are pinned. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Hawksoar
description: Magical energy propels the targets. They gain a magical flying speed of 60' + 10'/F or a magical flying speed equal to their land movement speed - whichever is higher.

name: Healing Touch
description: Caster touches an object or living creature and activates one of the following effects: \nObject: A small object is restored to pristine condition, reversing any damage caused in the last hour. This cannot influence magic items, any sentient item has a WIL save to negate. \nCreature: The target recovers 2 + 1/F d10 HP.

name: Helping Hand
description: Caster aids the target by granting them a placed roll on the next attack roll, resistance check/save, or skill check of choice. The caster may use this ability (Rank) times per day.

name: Honor Guard
description: A sigil is affixed to the target, creating a 12 + 5/F temporary HP barrier. The barrier provides the targets with 2 + 1/2F bonus DVs until broken.

name: Hydrodisk
description: A series of watery disks fly from the caster, pinning the targets, AGI save to negate. The disks have 1 HP and 0 DVs, the discs breaking upon taking that much damage, releasing the target. If a target under this spell's effect takes ice damage, the disks freeze, increasing their HP to 10.

name: Hopelessness
description: Grim thoughts bear into the minds of the targets, forcing them to feel as though they are fighting for naught - giving them 2 displaced rolls on setting resistance checks, WIL check to negate. If their odds of victory are low, the target may feel compelled to retreat. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Gemini
description: Caster generates a magical arcane apparition. The apparition always acts in the next round's initiative order with a 15 for its initiative check and must copy the movements and actions the caster took the previous round. The apparition does not attack targets, instead of firing all attacks and spells on the locations held by the targets. This effect may cause many single target attacks or other spells to miss, should the targets move. The apparition will only copy instantaneous evocations and actions, such as weapon skill attacks.

name: Icy Blast
description: Caster summons a ball made of ice and launches it, making a ranged attack roll, inflicting (Rank/2)d8 ice damage, and slowing them until the end of their next turn.

name: Ignition
description: As a reaction to a skill check, save/check, or attack roll, roll 1d4. Caster may choose to add this to the rolled value.

name: Inferno
description: Target area erupts into flame, inflicting 4 + 1/2F d6 fire damage if they perform any of the following actions, with a HEA save for half damage in each instance. \nPhysically move through the area using their movement action \nThey begin their turn in the designated area.

name: Incantation
description: A thin barrier of energy surrounds the area around the caster. All incoming and outgoing ranged projectiles are converted into either force, fire, lightning or ice damage - determined at the casting of this spell. The damage type can be altered as a core action.

name: Infuse Plague
description: Rotted tumors form on the target, inflicting 4 + 2/F instances of rot (Instances of rot stacking up to 10 times), inflicting 1d4 blight damage to the target at the end of the caster's turn for each instance, HEA save to halve the number of instances of Rot incurred. Targets may spend a swift action to remove any current instances of Rot for 1 HP per instance.

name: Invisibility
description: Willing targets become invisible until the end of this spell. Anything being worn, equipped, or carried by the invisible targets also becomes invisible. This spell ends when targets come in physical contact with another creature in any way, when the targets make any check or save, or when they force another target to make a check or save.

name: Harvest Soul
description: Caster conjures a spectral force that sweeps across that battlefield, making a ranged attack roll and inflicting 7 + 1/F d12 Blight damage on hit - any targets who die from this damage relinquish their soul to the caster. Caster may then spend that soul to resurrect a dead target that died within the past 10 minutes with 12 HP or they may choose a dead target - reanimating them, as a swift action. The reanimated target acts as Doppelganger (Rank 6-Illusion) For its duration except that it resembles the reanimated target instead of the caster.

name: Ironskin
description: The target of the spell gains immunity to a mundane damage type of the caster's choice. Additionally, the targets of this spell can expend a reaction to make a contested STR check to negate one melee attack each round.

name: Illusory Life
description: Caster sends out a wave of energy towards the targets, WIL check to negate. They become illusory, allowing the caster to disable any number of the following senses in them and disable other creatures' ability to use the following senses to perceive them; sight, smell, touch, hearing, and taste. (For example, a target with disabled sight is invisible but also blind, a target with disabled hearing is silent but deaf, etc). Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Inner Glow
description: Caster releases (Rank) orbs into their line of sight - the orbs dissipate should they leave it. Each orb emanates enough light to illuminate a 5' area. The caster can arrange these orbs of light however they please, directing them as a Swift Action or forcing them to coalesce around the caster, causing them to glow with an aura of whatever color they please. The orbs have a movement speed of 60' when directed by the caster as a Swift Action. Caster may only have one instance of this spell up at a time.

name: Lazarite Growth
description: Caster infuses energy into an area- reviving plants and healing targets. All targets recover 3d4 + 2/F d4 HP - in addition to automatically bringing any non-sentient dead plant matter back to life . When revived or reinfused with life, plants are adapted to the surroundings in such a way that they are capable of surviving, however extreme. Sentient plants recover 4 + 2/F d10 HP (Including those under the effect of Plantkin) from this spell.

name: Leech
description: Wrapping themselves or a target in a charming aura, all targets in a 20' radius around the initial target must make a WIL save. On failure, the targets are charmed by the initial target, and become susceptible to suggestions from them. Furthermore, it is impossible to tell the motivation, thoughts, or truthfulness of the initial target by any magical means for the duration of the spell. The caster can choose to display any thoughts of their choosing to those attempting to read their mind.

name: Last Vigil
description: As a reaction to being made unconscious (this does not prevent dying only respond to it), and if cast this way the caster removes the triggering condition (ie. return to consciousness.) The caster surrenders their body to their soul, which manipulates the flesh like a puppet granting them a PWR * 7 temporary HP barrier, making them immune to death effects (save for being reduced to negative their maximum health in HP), treating them as a celestial, demonic, or magical creature (caster's choice).

name: Life Drain
description: Caster shears away a portion of another creature's soul, making a ranged attack roll and inflicting 2d8 + 1/F Blight damage on hit while recovering HP equal to the amount of HP lost by the target; caster may instead choose to heal another person within LOS.

name: Justice
description: This spell may be cast with a reaction. If this spell is cast on the caster's turn, it may instead be cast with a Swift Action. \nThis spell can be cast in reaction to the caster making any kind of roll. The caster rerolls the roll with a placed roll. The user may then choose to either keep their original result on the roll or to replace it with the new one. \nAlternatively, the caster can use this spell to reroll any number of dice in their Alter Fate pool, then roll new dice to add to the pool until the pool's usual capacity is reached.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A massive bolt of lightning flies from the caster's fingertips in a line, inflicting 4 + 1/F d12 lightning damage, HEA save for half damage.

name: Life Transfer
description: Caster's essence reaches out towards up to 3 + 1/F willing targets, re-distributing their life energies as they see fit. Caster may freely rearrange the HP pools of the targets, though a single target's maximum HP cannot exceed their normal maximum. The caster must use the HP pools of the target and cannot transfer temporary barriers.

name: Lifeline
description: Upon seeing a target go under 0 HP, caster reaches out towards their life essence - suffusing it with energy. The target's HP is instead set to 0 and they immediately recover 4 + 1/F d10 HP.

name: Lightning Cascade
description: Dangerous storms form overhead. The caster makes 3 + 1/2F separate rolls to hit, as a series of lightning bolts strike a target. Each bolt inflicts 2d20 lightning damage on hit.

name: Lightning Reflexes
description: As a reaction to a target coming within melee reach of the caster, The caster may use up to 4 + 1/F of their own MP to make an attack against them.

name: Lightning Whip
description: Caster produces a whip of pure lightning energy, pulling a target toward themselves by making a melee attack roll with (Rank*10)' reach.

name: Loose Lips
description: Targets are compelled to blurt out information related to a subject that they would not typically share and lose 2 + 1/2F of their INT attribute, WIL save to negate. Targets blurt out a singular sentence.

name: Link Vitality
description: Targets combine their HP pools into one, WIL check to negate. Should any linked targets take damage or receive healing, it is subtracted from or added to the shared HP pool. All fall unconscious and die at the same thresholds. At the conclusion of this spell they have their remaining HP distributed evenly. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Lightspectre
description: 4 + 1/2F light-infused duplicates are created adjacent to the caster. The duplicates have a movement speed of 30 + 10'/F' and can be directed as a Swift Action by the caster. When one of the duplicates makes forceful contact with a target or is struck by a target, the duplicates detonate themselves, inflicting 3 + 1/2F d12 divine damage to the target if they are adjacent to the duplicate, HEA save for half damage.

name: Lifeplate
description: An ethereal coat of energy covers the target for the duration of the spell, or until the armor breaks. This armor grants a target 4 + 1/4F bonus DVs and 6 instances of elemental damage reduction. The armor blocks all damage until it has taken 40 + 8/F damage, at which point it breaks - no longer providing a benefit (breaking naturally at the end of the duration.) Upon breaking, an explosion radiates around the caster - causing all, including the target to recover 20 HP in a 10' radius.

name: Major Charm
description: Caster can choose to Charm, Confuse, or Petrify the targets, WIL check to negate. Affected targets automatically re-attempt the check at the end of their turn.

name: Magic Sense
description: Targets glow with an aura. The caster can identify which spells are being cast (Or the spells' effects) by expending a reaction. The caster can identify active effects by expending a Swift Action. The strength of the glow is reflective of the strength of the magical effects upon them.

name: Mage Armor
description: An arcane aura of the caster's choice surrounds them, granting the caster 8 + 1/2F armor DVs.

name: Major Illusion
description: Caster creates an illusion of their choosing in the target area. This illusion may have the sensory properties of - sight, smell, touch, hearing, and taste to fool the basic senses; the illusion's ability to cause harm is dependent upon how believable it is. The caster can continuously change the illusions within the area of Major Illusion by expending their Core Action, and any illusions within the area of effect can act independently of the caster. A target gets an AGI save to move to the nearest safe location, instead of falling if the illusion is modified to remove the floor from under them.

name: Mass Heal
description: A mark of the caster's choice appears above 4 + 1/F willing targets - infusing them with life energy. All targets recover 7 + 1/2F d12 HP, any excess HP over the target's maximum converts into a temporary HP barrier that persists for 1 minute.

name: Mass Life Drain
description: Each target takes 5 + 1/2F d8 blight damage, HEA save for half. A target of the caster's choice within range of recover an amount of HP equal to the damage dealt by this spell.

name: Mass Confusion
description: An aromatic mist begins to settle in the area, confusing all caught in its wake, WIL check to negate. Affected targets automatically re-attempt at the end of their turn.

name: Mass Puppet
description: Targets lose their movement action to the caster, WIL check to negate. The caster manipulates the water in their bodies - Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Swift Action during all later turns, the caster can force all affected targets to move in a direction of their choosing using their movement action on their turn. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Meld
description: A field of static surrounds the target, attempting to drain any active focus spells from them, WIL save to negate. All active focus spells on the target are dispelled, and melded into a single effect that is transferred to the caster. The caster maintains the focus for this single ability on themselves.

name: Maul
description: Caster spends their core action to make a melee attack roll. On hit, the caster inflicts an extra (Spell Rank) d10 as blunt damage in addition to their weapon's base damage.

name: Major Preservation
description: Caster touches an object (up to about the size of a house) - enhancing and preserving it. The object is restored to pristine condition, reversing any damage caused in the last hour. \nIf the item is a weapon, it gains 1 placed roll on the damage dice. If armor, it gains 3 + 1/4F bonus DVs. \nAn item with limited uses (that can regain them) regains a use; other effects are possible with GM discretion. This ability cannot influence magic items or cause them to regain a spell charge; sentient items may make a WIL save to negate.

name: Meteoric Acceleration
description: Willing targets sacrifice their body and mind in exchange for power. They become vulnerable to all effects and have 2 displaced rolls on all resistance checks. At the end of the initiative, targets receive another Core, Movement and Swift Action that they may use as they wish. This spell cannot be dropped before it's duration expires.

name: Minor Charm
description: Caster can choose to Frighten, Deafen, Encourage, Convince, or Blind the target, WIL check to negate. Encouraged targets feel happier and gain a placed roll on origin skill checks.

name: Minor Orbital
description: Caster creates a small planet-like or star-like body that aids in casting and orbits around them. The caster can move the orbital to any point within (Rank x 5)' of themselves as a Swift Action and may cast spells as though the spells were originating from the orbital. The caster may choose to attack with all orbitals, making ranged attack rolls with their core action - inflicting 1 + (Rank/5) d10 adaptive damage upon a successful hit. Only a single Minor Orbital can be active at once.

name: Minor Puppet
description: Targets lose their movement action to the caster, WIL check to negate - as the caster manipulates the water in their body. Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Swift Action during all later turns, the caster can force them to move in a manner of their choosing, taking effect on their next turn. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Moon Prescence
description: Caster blocks the sun with sorcerous magic, causing a total eclipse. As the skies darken, a sorcerous moon hangs overhead for the duration of the spell. All spells cost 2 + 1/4F fewer mana to cast.

name: Mountain's Might
description: Caster increases the power of the target's physical attacks by enchanting their weapon. The targets have 1 + 1/3F placed rolls on the damage die of all attack rolls made with the enchanted weapon.

name: Meddle
description: Caster telepathically reaches out towards targets in the area around them, WIL save to negate. The caster can detect what the targets are thinking, including passing thoughts for the duration, WIL save to negate. Questions verbally asked of the target are likely to shape their thoughts. As a core action, the caster mayshape a target's surface thoughts. This effect is not mind control, and a target will discard an implanted thought if it is significantly different from a thought they might consider normal for themselves to have.

name: Obsidian Storm
description: Obsidian spikes rain down upon the area. Targets caught in the storm receive 2 + 1/4F d12 points of force damage, AGI check for half damage and to negate being pinned until the end of their next turn. Additionally, any targets in the area of the spell receive a displaced roll on all HEA checks.

name: One with the Wind
description: For the duration of the spell, the caster can choose to dematerialize and subsequently materialize up to their move speed somewhere else in their LOS, immediately upon casting this spell and then as a Swift Action during all later turns. Upon materializing, those within a 10' radius of the caster receive 2d10 lightning damage.

name: Orbital
description: Caster enhances their Minor Orbital for the duration. Anyone may fire a single target evocation with a ranged attack roll through this Orbital, fracturing the spell into two separate, equal attacks. These attacks may target the same or different individuals so long as they are within the LOS of the ability. Each attack roll has 2 minus 1/4F displaced rolls when moving through the orbital. Spells can only pass through an orbital once.

name: Mirror Image
description: 4 + 1/F illusory duplicates of the caster are created in spaces adjacent to them. By default, duplicates mimic every part of the caster's actions, confusing enemies and making them unable to tell which of the duplicates is the real caster. Immediately after casting the spell and afterward as a Swift Action, the caster may command every illusion to move. The illusions have a movement speed equal to the caster. The duplicates have no physical presence, and their nature is revealed when they are struck or damaged. For illusion detection, each duplicate is an individual illusion.

name: Overgrowth
description: An array of plantlife covers the target for the duration of the spell, or until the armor breaks. This armor blocks all damage until it has taken 60 + 8/F damage, at which point it breaks (breaking naturally at the end of the duration.) As long as any of the barrier remains, the barrier recovers 20 + 5/F HP at the end of the user's turn up to a maximum of 80HP.

name: Overload
description: A tremendous degree of energy floods into the effigy, greatly amplifying it's abilities. All damage dice rolled as a result of an effigy's actions are doubled and it has an additional core action as a part of Direction. At the start of the caster's next turn, the effigy is destroyed.

name: Outer Chaos
description:
The caster draws upon the realm of chaos to aid in shaping the battlefield, gaining a selection of random components to reshape surrounding terrain. To determine your selection of components, roll (4 + 1/F)d6 and gain components from the following table in accordance with each die's value: 
1: A 5'x1' steel battlement. A character standing behind this item gets exceptionally protective cover but may make ranged or melee attacks through it. 
2: Two 5'x5', 10' deep pitfall traps. The trap is covered in earth, though a successful awareness check will detect it. When a character steps on it, they must make an AGI save or fall in. A character unaware of the trap gets a displaced roll on this save. These may not be placed on occupied spaces. 
3: A 10' radius of difficult terrain that inflicts slowed on all characters moving in it 
4: A 10'x30' gust of wind in the caster's chosen direction. A character entering or starting their turn inside of this item must make a STR save or be pushed 10' in the wind's direction. 
5: A 5' radius of fog that grants cover to all characters in it 
6: Three 5'x5', 10' tall blocks of iron wall. These may not be placed on occupied spaces. 
The caster may distribute their components within the spell's area as they see fit. Components vanish in a flash of chaotic energy at the end of the spell's duration

name: Pandemonium
description:
The caster summons an apocalyptic storm. At the end of each of the caster's turns, they roll 1d6. All targets in the storm suffer an effect from the following table corresponding to the die's value. 
1: Every target within the storm is pinned by a wave of force, until the end of their next turn 
2: All targets in the storm receive an instance of Chaos Warp. Upon becoming Warped they must cast chaos once every 24 hours or receive the consequences. 
3: Lightning bolts strike up to three different targets of the caster's choice in the storm, inflicting 5d20 damage and inflicting slow until the end of their next turn, AGI save for half damage. 
4: All targets in the storm are stunned until the end of their next turn, AGI save to negate. 
5: All targets in the storm have their HP set to half of it's normal maximum, HEA save to negate. 
6: All targets in the storm at or below half their maximum HP immediately fall unconscious and are put into a forced rest period, as per Stable Unconsciousness.

name: Paradox Shot
description: A prismatic coat forms over the targets, WIL save to negate. For the duration of the spell, the caster can utilize their Swift Action to return the targets to the position they held at the end of their previous turn. Affected targets can re-attempt with a core action.

name: Parasitic Growth
description: Dangerous seedlings grow over the surface of the target, these seedlings decrease armor DVs by 6 (Any damage inflicted by the seedlings must be repaired before the armor can provide the same level of benefit) and inflict 3 + 1/4F d12 piercing damage each at the end of the caster's turn, HEA save to negate the armor damage.

name: Path of Light
description: Caster ignites their body, wreathing themselves in magical flames that are harmless to them but warp the visibility around them while altering their fire magic.
