While active, any spells that inflict fire damage blind targets until the end of their next turn. Additionally, the caster may cast Fireball (Pyromancy - 4) by utilizing their Swift Action.

name: Pause Object
description: For the duration of this spell, the selected objects are suspended in time, losing all of their momenta. When the caster drops the spell, the items begin moving again - regaining all previously held momentum. Caster can only have a total amount of mass equal to 20 * (Rank) kilograms suspended by this spell at once. Objects can support a total mass of up to 500 kilograms with this spell at once; breaking this limit causes the spell to end. Targets must make a STR check to move an object from suspension. Objects affected by this spell are merely paused, and so retain the momentum they had before the spell ended.

name: Path of Flame
description: Caster's body is seared by fire magic, enhancing its magical potential. All of the caster's flame-based abilities leave an afterburn. The afterburn is an additional effect on all of the caster's fire spells. While active, any attacks that inflict fire damage also incur 1 + 1/3F Instances of suffering (Fire) to the targets in addition to the attack's primary effects.

name: Minor Illusion
description: Caster creates an illusion of their choosing in the target area. This illusion may have and produce a continuous stream of sensory properties of - sight, smell, hearing, and taste to fool the basic senses, though the caster may only choose up to (Rank/2) of these sensations. The illusion has a maximum movement speed of 30', the caster can move the illusion utilizing their Swift Action. No illusion produced by this spell can create sensory stimuli so strong that it causes harm.

name: Phantasmal Attacker
description: A phantasmal fighter appears adjacent to the target, following them wherever they go whenever they move. Phantasmal fighters have DVs equal to the target they follow. Phantasmal fighters dissipate when their associated target makes a successful attack roll against them. While a phantasmal fighter is adjacent to the target, they receive two displaced rolls on attack rolls against creatures other than their phantasmal fighter.

name: Phase
description: Willing targets teleport to a location that the caster has memorized, or they can see on the same plane. This spell must be finessed twice to teleport into another plane.

name: Perfect Distortion
description: Willing targets become invisible for the spell's duration. Anything being worn or equipped by the invisible targets also becomes invisible. This invisibility is not lost upon interacting with creatures, attacking, or taking any other actions, though such actions may reveal a target's current position to an enemy.

name: Phantasm
description: Caster creates a phantom up to 10' tall, 10' wide, 10' deep that can continuously move in the area - with an accompanying flight speed of 30'. Caster may use their Swift Action to direct the phantasm to attack a target within the LOS, making a melee attack roll. The phantasm inflicts 2 + 1/2F d6 stress damage on a successful strike. This phantom can have visual, auditory, temperature, or smell properties. When creating the phantom, caster can choose any combination of these properties - though it must hold a visual property of some sort.

name: Phantasmal Defender
description: Caster creates a phantasm (resembling them) that shares a space with them and persists with Focus. It is invisible to those without ranks in illusion. The caster can direct the phantasm using their Core Action (granting it a core and movement action) to manipulate objects (Such as weapons) or cast abilities as if it were the caster, observe a target (memlock and maintain LOS even if the caster cannot), with the same skill as the caster. The phantasm shares all DVs and attributes with the caster - any damage done to the phantasm is reflected onto the caster. Once cast, this spell can be toggled on and off using a Swift Action - though it can be interrupted as though it were a focus spell.

name: Piercing Vine
description: A barbed, piercing vine erupts from the caster's fingertips. The vine impales and wraps around the target inflicting 5 + 1/F d10 piercing damage and pinning them in place, AGI check for half damage and to negate being Pinned. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Piercing Light
description: A lance of light flies from the caster's fingertips, inflicting 2 + 1/F d8 divine damage, HEA save for half damage and to negate being blinded until the end of their next turn.

name: Physician's Poppet
description:
Willing targets have miniature replicas created of them; appearing within the caster's grip or on their person, of whatever materials are available and appropriate. The poppets may only be used by the caster and they must have the poppet on their person to use it. Once per turn the caster may use a poppet as a swift action or reaction, using a poppet confers one of the following effects to the character the poppet represents: 
Gain a placed roll on the next HEA or WIL save / check over the duration. 
14 HP barrier that persists over the duration. 
Target suffers 10 piercing damage, poppet and the target switch places.

name: Plantkin
description: Caster's body becomes plantlike. Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Core Action during all later turns the caster can force a target to be affected by the next turn of any present continuous spells.

name: Phantasmal Evasion
description: Caster gains the ability to create illusory clones that take the place of the caster, allowing them to dodge. For the duration of the ability, the target may use their reaction to prepare 2 + 1/3F illusory clones. The caster may expend a clone at no action cost to dodge an attack by allowing a clone to take the hit and jumping out of the way (up to 10'.) This ability may be used to dodge physical and magical attacks, but sufficiently magical spells (rank 6 and above) cannot be blocked in this way. Additionally, the caster may only dodge an area of effect if the 10' jump is enough to take them out of the radius.

name: Plant Control
description:
The caster channels an immense amount of life energy, allowing them to shape and create large amounts of plant life for the duration. Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Swift Action during all later turns the caster can use one of the following abilities. 
The caster may grow or reshape trees into walls or shelter, cover the area in plant life adapted to the environment, and turn barren wasteland into verdant jungle. 
Make a ranged attack roll, wrapping a target in strangling vines on hit, pinning them until the end of their next turn. 
Shield a target until the end of their next turn, giving them a 20 HP temporary barrier. Plants created or reshaped persist past the end of the spell's duration.

name: Polymorph
description: Caster transforms the target into any animal with a tier equal to the caster's current tier minus 2, WIL save to negate. The target adopts all of the animal's attributes, but retains their ability to speak their current language if the animal normally has an INT above 0. This transformation has special rules; when the target is polymorphed their HP and mana is set to that of the animal, they may only use abilities the animal has access to, and upon depleting the HP of the transformed animal the target returns back to their exact state before being polymorphed, save location.

name: Probe
description: Caster probes the minds of the targets, should they have one, WIL save to negate. The caster can truthfully glean a question about the targets - though the question must be answered with a 'Yes' or 'No.' For 24 hours after being affected by Probe, targets get a displaced roll to detect illusions made by the caster and checks to resist the caster's Illusion spells.

name: Possession
description: Caster requires a biological sample of the creature they are targeting, consuming the sample as a part of casting the spell. The caster gains complete access to the target's senses for the spell's duration. The target is unaware that this spell is being cast on them, but if the target is not already magical, they radiate magical energy for the spell's duration.

name: Primordial Sphere
description: Caster surrounds themselves in a sphere of raw chaotic energy, granting themselves their choice of mundane resistance or elemental resistance until the start of their next turn. However, whichever resistance they don't choose, they become susceptible to.

name: Prismatic Volley
description: Caster launches a flurry of prismatic bolts at the target area, making 3 + 1/2F ranged attack rolls. Targets take 3d8 Pure_Magic damage on hit or receive temporary hit points equal to the bolt's damage for 4 + 2/F rounds, as decided by the caster.

name: Purge
description: Caster can choose to remove 2 + 1/2F spell effects/specific effects they name, WIL save to negate. If a specifically named ability is not present; some other random ceases. Targets must always attempt to resist the spell effect. Permanent effects are only suppressed for up to one hour on a failed save.

name: Pulse
description: Caster electrifies a weapon increasing the reach or range of the weapon by 10', while also causing the first struck enemy to be knocked prone.

name: Pulsar
description: A massive stream of energy flies from the caster's fingertips in a straight line, inflicting 8 + 1/2F d20 adaptive damage, searing affected targets flesh with magical energy - causing them to have 2 displaced rolls on all HEA checks for the next minute, AGI save for half damage and to negate the displaced rolls.

name: Quicken
description: Targets of this spell move slightly faster through time. They can use their Swift Action to either take an additional 1 + 1/4F move actions or to gain an extra attack the next time they make a strike this turn. Affected targets also receive 2 + 1/4F placed rolls on all AGI checks.

name: Radiant Command
description: Caster ignites the spirits of any blinded characters with divine force, allowing the caster to compel them for the duration. The caster can expend their reaction to grant a blinded target another Core Action; the caster may spend this action to perform anything the target could normally do with this action. The affected target will believe the action they take is of their own volition.

name: Radiance
description: Caster coats themselves and up to 3 other targets with an aura of light, preventing them (and anything they wear, equip, or carry) from being seen. They are invisible to others - targets who can see invisible the characters make a PER save to negate blindness for 4 turns when observing them. The effect ends for any target that makes an attack roll, casts a spell, or is forced to make a check/save but continues for any others.

name: Rampant Verdance
description: Caster concentrates on a (Rank * 5) radius. Plant life begins to erupt in the area, if it is physically impossible the plant life instead immediately dies upon eruption this restriction holds true for all spells in this group that rely upon plantlife.

name: Random Spell
description: Caster channels the pure chaotic energies of the universe. Caster must roll a d2 to determine whether it will be elemental: 1, or divine: 2. Caster then rolls a d10 to determine which spell group they will cast from where spell groups are numbered in the same order as the book. Then roll a d6 + 1/F to determine the rank of the spell. At this point the caster may select which spell they wish to cast so long as it is in the proper group at the correct rank.

name: Reality Tear
description: Caster rips the fabric of reality open, unleashing primal chaos upon the targets. A random effect is inflicted on all targets that end their turn in the rift by rolling on the chaos chart (This effect lasts for 1 + 1/F Days) in addition to inflicting 4 + 1/2F d12 chaotic damage to them, AGI save for half damage and to negate the chaos effect.

name: Rebuke
description: As a reaction to being struck by an attack, the caster strikes back with a brilliant flash of light. Caster rolls 4 + 1/F d12, reducing the damage by that amount. If the caster blocks all of the damage, the remaining rolled amount is dealt back to the attacker as divine damage.

name: Reflection
description: The caster creates inert copies of the targets in a space adjacent to the caster (the copies retain the attributes and HP of the target), WIL save to negate. Damage and abilities inflicted upon the copy are reflected onto the target if the copy fails. Should the target leave the LOS, this spell ends.

name: Redirect
description: This spell is used as a reaction to an attempt to cast another spell. Caster may choose to redirect the spell at a target within 60' + 20'/F - becoming the new caster of the spell, PWR save to negate, though retaining the original spell's resistance check. The caster also gains an inherent knowledge of the spell upon redirecting it. Caster may choose to allow the spell to glow with an aura denoting the caster's element.

name: Reduction
description: An earthen aura surrounds the target's body. This spell is cast in reaction to the caster or a nearby target being hit by an attack that inflicts mundane damage, reducing the damage by half.

name: Regrowth
description: Natural energy flows into a willing target, causing them to recover 4+ 1/2F d10 HP at the start of each of their turns. The target glows with an aura of caster's choice.

name: Rejuvenating Ray
description: A jet of energy spills from the caster's hands toward the target, causing them to recover 6 + 1/F d10 HP. Any excess HP over the target's maximum converts into a temporary HP barrier that persists for 1 minute.

name: Refresh
description: Caster marks a willing target, empowering them with life energy. Target recovers 1d8 HP at the end of their turn; additionally, the caster may stall 1 + 1/2F negative conditions or abilities until the spell ends, they stop receiving any negative effects or making checks until Refresh ends and then they make the appropriate number of saves/checks and suffer the appropriate consequences for the number of rounds delayed.

name: Resist Magic
description: A mark of the caster's choice appears above a willing target for the spell's duration. When a resistance check or save targets them, they gain 2 + 1/4F placed rolls on up to 2 + 1/2F checks or saves before the mark and spell expire. All checks count as a use, even if they are not resisted.

name: Renew Object
description: Caster can repair simple broken things or extremely superficial wounds (Rank/2) times per day. It does not restore the inherent magical properties of an object. Any repairs done with this spell leave an obvious substitute where the damage used to be.

name: Replicate
description: The target has one of their abilities copied (Chosen randomly by the GM) onto the caster's effigy. The effigy must have the necessary resource to utilize the ability, unless a resource itself is stolen. This stolen ability is able to take the form of a target's unique power at the GM's discretion, such as an elemental immunity or an archetype. The effigy always knows what ability is stolen before using it.

name: Rot
description: Caster makes a ranged attack roll, inflicting 1 + (rank/5) instances of rot (Instances of rot stacking up to 10 times), inflicting 1d4 blight damage to the target at the end of the caster's turn for each instance. Targets may spend a swift action to remove any current instances of Rot for 1 HP per instance.

name: Reviere
description: All blinded targets in the radius have their senses manipulated by the caster. The caster can force the target to see whatever the caster wishes until they are no longer blinded, INT save to negate.

name: Rune Brand
description: Caster casts a runic brand onto all within the radius, should they fail a WIL check. While branded all healing done to the affected targets is fire damage instead. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Radiant Raiment
description: Caster coats themselves in an aura of multicolored light, making them difficult to perceive. They are seen as a non-specific agent of their (the character's) faith, WIL save to negate. Those who witness the aura have a period up to 5 + 5/F minutes before and 5 + 5/F minutes after this viewing replaced with the hazy memory of a divinity affirming event (typically an appropriate miracle.) For two finesses the caster can instead choose to place a specific memory they create in anyone who views them.

name: Scry
description: Caster places a 6'' radius magical eye in an extrapolated (Within 100') or memlocked location - granting them line of sight. By using a swift action, the caster may switch their perspective over to that of the eye and back again, blinding and deafening themselves, but they gain the eye's vision and hearing - the eye can see 20' through magical darkness. For two finesses this eye can move at a movement rate of 5' within the radius.

name: Seed Scatter
description: Caster directs a stream of leaves outwards, originating from their hands and striking anything in the stream's path, AGI save to negate. Any targets hit by the stream are pushed ten feet back and knocked prone.

name: Sensation
description: Caster goes unconscious - and remains so as long as they maintain this spell. They gain direct control of the effigy - gaining all of its senses, replacing their own actions with those of the effigy. The caster can utilize their swift action to end this effect.

name: Shade
description: Target is transformed into an ethereal, invisible creature that can pass through all obstacles. While they can see the material world, they cannot affect it nor be affected by it using any physical or magical means. The target can enable and disable this effect using a swift action.

name: Shadow Servants
description:
Malediction surrounds the caster, which is then directed at all selected targets, allowing the caster to either: 
Alter their motivation so long as it does not directly hurt themselves or people they care deeply for. 
Confuse them. 
Frighten them. 
WIL check to negate. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Righteousness
description:
A mark of the caster's choice appears above all targets. Targets become subject to any 2 + 1/2F of the following effects: 
Targets are stripped of Divine or Blight resistance or DR, HEA save to negate. 
Ethereal targets are made corporeal/physical, HEA save to negate. 
Sentient targets become spell jammed, WIL save to negate. 
Construct/Object targets are rendered inert/deactivated (as unconsciousness), WIL save to negate. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Shadow Slick
description: Shadows swim at the caster's discretion, breaking and reforming in twisting dark shapes as they shift the terrain, causing sight and touch to become unreliable. Targets within the area are slowed and targets who end their turn within the area are pinned until the start of their next turn, STR or AGI check to negate (target's choice.)

name: Shadow Thought
description: Target's course of action may be influenced by the caster, as long as the changes do not conflict with the target's wishes, the target receives an inferior WIL, displaced roll on all skill checks for the duration of the ability, and they struggle to form their thoughts, WIL save to negate.

name: Shadowflash
description: A pall of darkness radiates from the caster, obscuring the area around them, making speech unintelligible to other characters, and transforming others in the area - making it difficult to tell who is who. Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Swift Action during all later turns the caster can switch places with another target within the area. Should the target be unwilling, they have a WIL save to negate

name: Scourge
description:
Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Swift Action during all later turns the caster can use one of the following abilities. 
Blight a 20' radius area, inflicting 2 + 1/4F instances of Rot, HEA save to halve the instances. 
Use blight to attack a target within the LOS by making a ranged attack roll - inflicting 3 + 1/2F d10 blight damage on hit, reducing their maximum HP for 4 hours by an equal amount. This maximum HP reduction follows standard stacking rules and thus only the greatest instance applies. 
Compel a single target afflicted with Rot to speak about a topic listed by the caster, at least a sentence long.

name: Shadowsight
description: Supernatural darkness swims in the target's eyes, congealing in their gaze, allowing them to see Rank*10' in natural darkness and Rank*5' in magical darkness. While under this spell's effect, the target may utilize their swift action to meet another target's gaze, forcing a contested check of WIL, causing them to become Frightened as the darkness in the character's eyes reflects an alien fear. Affected targets can re-attempt the check utilizing their swift action, becoming immune to effects from this spell for an hour on success. The visual effect of this spell does not extend the vision and terminates at the end of the target's natural vision if it is shorter.

name: Share Memory
description: Caster implants 1 + 1/F minutes of a memory they have into the target's mind. The target will retain this memory as they would one of their own, though they are aware that this memory was magically implanted into them, WIL save to negate.

name: Shared Burden
description: Caster attempts to transfer any active conditions or abilities they or a willing target have onto another target, WIL save to negate if the target is unwilling.

name: Share Vision
description: Caster shares or forces their sight onto the targets, WIL save to negate. Affected targets lose their sight, and are only capable of seeing through the eyes of the caster. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Shadowform
description: Caster turns themselves into a dark-ghost like shadow, giving themselves resistance to all damage except divine and Pure_Magic. They are immaterial; they pass through all non magical, nonmetal objects, though they are still capable of casting spells. While in darkness, the caster can choose to dematerialize and subsequently materialize within 120' of their LOS if that location is also in darkness, immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Swift Action during all later turns.

name: Shadow Poppet
description:
Targets have miniature shadow replicas created of them within the caster's grip or on their person, WIL check to negate. The poppets may only be used by the caster and they must have the poppet on their person to use it. Once per round caster may use a poppet as a swift action or reaction, using a poppet causes one of the following effects: 
Shadows pull the target 30' in any direction. 
Target becomes Frightened of the caster until the end of their next turn. 
Blind the target until the end of their next turn. 
Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Shield
description: A mark of the caster's choice appears above a willing target. The mark generates a magical barrier that absorbs (Rank) damage before breaking, all remaining damage continuing as normal. This shield reapplies itself to the target at the start of each round.

name: Silent Snow
description: Caster surrounds a target with a flurry of snow and howling wind that makes spell casting difficult by spell jamming them, WIL check to negate. Caster may move the storm as a Swift Action - forcing the next target caught within its wake to make the WIL check or be inflicted with the condition. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Silent Field
description: A shimmering field of anti-magic energy grows over the indicated area. Any targets in the area of the spell's effect are spell jammed. Silent Field negates any continuous or focus spells in the area. Magic (buffs, debuffs, charms, and items) does not function in the area - though magic begins working again once outside the radius. Magic targeting characters in the area disperse harmlessly, fizzling without effect.

name: Singularity
description: Caster lets loose a ripple of energy in the area, inflicting 4 + 1/F d10 adaptive damage pushing targets as close to the center of the area as possible, STR save for half damage and to negate being pushed.

name: Slow
description: The caster slows the flow of time around the targets, making their actions take more time. Affected targets may only perform a single action(one core action or one swift action or one movement action or one reaction) per turn. Affected targets also suffer a displaced roll on any AGI roll. Affected targets automatically re-attempt the save at the end of their turn.

name: Silent Ward
description: A mark of the caster's choice appears above willing targets for the spell's duration. Each target receives a temporary barrier that absorbs 12 + 2/F damage. This shield reapplies itself to the targets at the start of each round.

name: Skyshatter
description: On the first round, a beautiful prismatic moon falls from the sky, shattering into colorful rays of light, inflicting 6 + 1/F d12 adaptive damage to all within the radius, AGI save for half. On the second round of this spell, stars begin raining from the sky, targeting 3 + 1/F different targets dictated by the caster, making ranged attack rolls for each star, inflicting 4d10 adaptive damage on hit.

name: Smoke Cloud
description: Caster generates intense fires in the radius, causing a plume of thick black smoke to erupt from inside the region. \nThose inside the smoke cloud receive the benefits of cover. \nThose inside are obscured, making it difficult to track their movements.

name: Sorcerous Strike
description: Caster expends their core action to make a melee attack roll. On hit, the caster inflicts (Spell Rank/2) d10 extra adaptive damage in addition to their weapon's base damage.

name: Soul Command
description: AGI Caster reaches out with a pair of spectral hands, grabbing onto targets within range. The caster attempts to separate their soul or animating force from their bodies by grasping them, WIL save to negate; soulless targets must be crudely physically manipulated, requiring an AGI save instead and only moving up to only half the distance. Once per target, per round, a grasped target can be moved 30' + 5'/F, as a swift action. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Spiral Spikes
description: A flurry of stone spikes rise in a cone in front of the caster. They inflict 5 + 1/F d10 force damage to all caught in the area of effect, AGI save for half. These spikes remain on the battlefield, slowing all who attempt to move through the area.

name: Soul Drain
description: Caster violently manipulates the souls of their allies and enemies alike - dragging allies closer to life and enemies closer to death, WIL save to negate. Allies designated by the caster can fight beyond the threshold of life - should their HP fall below zero, they will remain conscious. However, this will not prevent the target from dying at their normal threshold or from bleeding out. Enemies designated by the caster have their soul bound. For every 5' the target physically moves they take 6 blight damage - restoring an equal amount to the caster. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action.

name: Soul Grip
description: AGI Caster reaches out with a spectral hand to grab a soul within range; moving them 30' + 10'F in a direction the caster's choice, WIL save to negate. Targets without a soul must be crudely physically manipulated, requiring an AGI save instead and only moving up to only half the distance.

name: Static Charge
description: Caster supercharges their melee attacks this turn and the next. All the damage dealt to one target can jump LOS 40' to another target, HEA save to halve this damage and stop the static from jumping onto another target, repeating the effect. The chain repeats itself until the caster ends it, or the HEA save is successfully made; in all cases the lightning cannot jump back to targets that have already been struck.

name: Stabilize
description: Caster stabilizes a target in a state of unstable unconsciousness if they are up to (Rank)*2 ft away. This effect prevents the target from bleeding out further.

name: Stardust Pulse
description: The caster burns up part of their soul to release a roaring blast of energy, inflicting 3d20 divine damage, AGI save for half damage. As a reaction to seeing this ability; targets within 60' and chosen by the caster (including the caster) can repeat this spell without spending mana (their HP is immediately reduced to zero when doing so, but they are in a stable unconsciousness.)

name: Sorcerous Shield
description: Caster creates a swirling wall of collected magical energy in front of themselves that negates incoming magical energy, causing area of effect spells to wrap around the shield and projectiles to dissipate on its side. The barrier itself has a HP total of 110 +20/F and breaks upon receiving that much damage from spells. When a target walks through the shield, all magical effects affecting them are targeted by Dispel - Interdictions 2. As a Swift Action, the caster may move the barrier 10' in any direction.

name: Stoneskin
description: Willing targets receive a 3 + 1/4F bonus to all DVs. Their skin hardens, making them tougher and more akin to stone.

name: Steal Energy
description: Caster steals the target's magical energy. They receive the caster's choice of an inferior WIL, CHA, or INT while a separate target of the caster's choice gains an exceptional of the same attribute, WIL save to negate.

name: Storm
description: A storm forms overhead. Torrential rain pours onto everyone in the area, limiting LOS to 20'. Immediately, and then all rounds afterwards using their swift action, the caster can direct a torrent of elemental energy from the storm at any target within its radius, making a ranged attack roll and inflicting 4+ 1/2F d12 lightning damage on hit.

name: Stormcaller
description: Caster reaches out to 4 + 1/F targets, taunting them with a display of power, forcing them to use their movement action to move towards the caster in a non-suicidal manner on each of their turns, WIL save to negate. If they are right next to the caster, they must stay as close as they can. Affected targets can re-attempt with a core action.

name: Super Chaos
description: A glob of ectoplasmic chaos flies towards the target as the caster makes a ranged attack roll, inflicting 8 + 1/F d10 chaotic damage and causing a chaos effect. The caster chooses 2 + 1/F effects within 2 + 1/F of the rolled effect, the caster knows what this effect is. They may not choose the same effect twice and must choose at least one effect.

name: Synthesis
description: Caster fuses with an effigy as per Celestial Alignment (Equilibrium - 10), however the caster does not gain any new actions - keeping their standard suite of actions. They otherwise receive all other benefits.

name: Storm Bubble
description: A sphere of water surrounds the target point. Spells targeting individuals inside of the barrier below rank 5, or have a ranged attack roll have no effect whatsoever. Above rank 5, when a magical effect targets an individual inside the barrier, they have a placed roll on any attempts to resist the spell. Should the check be made, the target negates all effects from the spell. Individuals inside the barrier receive no penalties when attacking those outside of it.

name: Telepathy
description: Caster reaches out towards a mind up to (Rank * 10) away. The caster can maintain a continuous stream of mental communication with them, allowing them to both communicate with one another so long as they share one language in common, WIL save to negate. The caster can mask their presence so that the target does not know where the voices came from.

name: Tempest
description: Caster becomes a furious conduit of tempestuous power, gaining the ability to cast any Rank 0 spell as a swift action or reaction. They also gain the ability to dodge and nullify a singular attack roll made against the caster as a reaction. After dodging an attack roll, the caster can immediately choose to make a strike using up to 4 martial points against the original attacker, should they be within reach/range.

name: Stygian Blur
description: Caster wraps themselves in a twisting cloak of shadows which snatch and consumes ambient shadows as it moves to defend its wearer and reflect back only shaded horror. Awareness checks against the caster inflict 2d8 stress damage and cause the target to lose any memlocks on them or their possessions, WIL save to negate. Additionally, the caster gains 2 + 1/4F bonus DVs and becomes invisible in darkness (this invisibility ends when targets come in physical contact with another creature in any way, or when the targets make any kind of check or save, resuming at the start of the next round should they still remain in darkness.)

name: Stifling Shadow
description: A devouring shadow forms and breaks like a rushing wave, flooding the area with twisting shadows, flowing into victims and suppressing their magical energy, causing them to become spell jammed while in the area, with a WIL save to instead have the 1 + 1/F maintained continuous or focus spells paused while they are in the area. All targets within the area treat all other targets within the area as having cover unless they can visually pierce magical darkness.

name: Terraform
description: Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Swift Action during all later turns the caster can use one of the following abilities. Suspend and control the volume of earth up to the area in the air and change its shape, by moving it 10' + 10'/F per round. Use earth to attack a target within the LOS by making a ranged attack roll - inflicting 4 + 1/4F d8 force damage on hit. Shape and create structures out of the volume of earth as a Swift Action. These remain in place even after the spell has expired. Walls formed out of this spell have a HP pool of 11 + 4'/F.

name: The Devil
description: Fate bends and twists around the target; they gain a placed roll on every roll (examples include but are not limited to turmoil d6 rolls, damage rolls, resistance check rolls, and attack rolls) The target has unnatural luck, reality twists itself to suit the needs of the target.

name: The Hanged Man
description: Until the end of their next turn, the willing target will automatically succeed all resistance checks (except for Dispel and spells like it, in which case the target must resist as normal), and is immune to all damage. In the case of instant kill effects, the target shimmers with white light as the effect harmlessly passes over them.

name: The Hierophant
description: Caster mystically attunes themselves to the fates of those surrounding them, allowing them to more easily deal with their intentions. Caster receives 2 + 1/4F placed rolls on the first resistance check they make each round in addition to 4 + 1/4F bonus DVs, and can no longer be surprised. They become immune to being convinced.

name: The Lovers
description: This spell allows the caster and other willing targets to link their minds. As long as individuals remain on the same plane as each other, they may communicate telepathically with each other. Telepathic communication can convey more information in a shorter time period than verbal communication, though limits still exist.

name: The Magician
description: This ability allows the user to more easily see through all illusions, disguises, and shape changes. Caster's form will sprout eyes all over their body as they sense and see every part of the world - even through magic. They will automatically see secret and hidden doors. They can see all invisible, ethereal, or immaterial targets more easily as well. The caster is immune to blindness and can see through all illusions.

name: The World
description: Caster may cast any scrying or space-time spell they know on a memlocked location, even across planes. Casting this spell is a two-round process: On the first round, the caster casts this spell. On the second round, the caster casts the spell they wish to transfer to the target location. The caster still pays both spells' mana costs.

name: The Hermit
description: Caster begins to draw knowledge of the area to themselves, gaining a profound insight into the backgrounds of the deities, histories, and secrets of the area. A figure lectures the caster on all of these topics. If an ability is actively preventing the user from knowing something about the area, the caster of this spell sees a firm silhouette of what/who is blocking this information. The blocker can also feel the presence of the caster. Alternatively, this spell can be used to attempt to contact any mysterious entities in the area.

name: Thunderlink
description: WIL An electric trail forms, linking all targets in the area. When a linked target ends its turn in the area, it receives 1 + 1/2F d20 lightning damage, HEA save for half. When a linked target leaves the area by any means, they are stunned, HEA save to negate.

name: Thundering Steel
description: Caster produces ammunition for a ranged weapon or edges a melee weapon with magic. Enchanted weapons that miss its attack on a target under this spell's effect inflicts 1 + 1/4F d8 lightning damage for each attack missed (Cumulative for each attack missed), HEA save to negate the damage.

name: Transformation
description: Caster gains the ability to transform into a unique creature. They choose three 'traits' that any other creature they have access to has and must similarly select a base creature from which they draw their attacks, movespeeds, and general size. They are not granted access to any HP, attribute or armor changes. They may also not choose the trait 'Deadly.'

name: The Wheel of Fortune
description: Caster rolls a chosen set of 5 dice, setting aside any dice that have their maximum value, rerolling the rest - caster keeps rerolling as long as a die has its maximum value on it. If no die has its maximum value, caster stops rolling. Caster adds all dice - including the dice they have set aside, to their Alter Fate pool (Scrying - 0.) The dice added by Wheel of Fortune do not count toward the limit imposed by the spell. Additionally, until the caster's next rest period there is no action cost to substituting dice with Alter Fate (Scrying - 0.)

name: Transposition
description: A shroud of purple smoke engulfs the effigy and the caster. The effigy and the caster swift places. Alternatively, this spell teleports the effigy to an unoccupied space next to the caster or vise versa.

name: Tremorsense
description: The caster can sense the vibrations in the ground to pinpoint any creature that moves or takes core actions in a 100' radius. This spell does not work on flying creatures or creatures that are not connected to the caster through a completely solid medium. This sense is highly accurate on targets that it can perceive and may replace vision in case of blindness.

name: Tunnel Vision
description: The targets' minds are plunged into a mystical void (the appearance of which is chosen by the caster), they become frightened of the caster and mesmerized by the void (whose appearance is determined by the caster), WIL save to negate. While mesmerized, the target can only perceive themselves, the caster, and the mystical void. The spell is broken if the line of sight between the target and the caster is broken.

name: Twilight Flurry
description: Caster makes a series of ranged attack rolls, firing (rank/2) arcs of multi-coloured rays from their fingertips inflicting 1d10 Pure_Magic damage to the target on hit.

name: Twilight Orbital
description: Caster enhances their Minor Orbital. Upon making a successful ranged attack roll with their Minor Orbital, it becomes stuck to the target. The caster can then deliver touch spells through the orbital (bypassing movement DVs) or expend their core action to activate it for a turn. The target receives 5 + 1/F d10 adaptive damage, HEA save for half when it is activated. Affected targets can remove the Minor Orbital with a Core Action.

name: Twist Mind
description: Targets receive a nightmare or daydream during their next attempted rest, WIL save to negate. This prevents them from recovering mana, HP, or any other effect normally gained through rest and convinces them of something of the target's choice. Caster can specify a few conditions, such as the nature of the nightmares, if the dream stops when the target reaches a certain location, etc. Targets are not aware they are under magical effects.

name: Umbrapush
description: A horrifying sheet of shadows spread outwards from the caster, inflicting 1 + 2/F d20 stress damage, pushing targets 15' backwards and inflicting frightened, WIL check for half damage and to negate the push/frighten. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action to remove frighten.

name: Umbral Momentum
description: Caster envelops the targets with the deepest shadow, causing them to absorb light and move at inhuman speeds. Targets take half damage from damaging spells that would force a target to make an AGI check/save, or originate from the Light Spell group (Making the check in either case negates the damage and effect). The movespeed of targets is also increased by 25' + 5'/F.

name: Underbrush
description: Caster suffocates the magical energies in the area, draining 1d8 mana from any target that ends their turn in the area, and spelljamming them for the whole duration, WIL check to negate. Affected targets can re-attempt with a swift action to stop being spell jammed.

name: Unstable Presence
description: The caster disrupts their connection to reality with chaotic energy, causing themselves to phase in and out unpredictably. At the end of each turn, the caster rolls a d6. On a result of 4-6, the caster phases out of reality completely until the start of their next turn. During this time, they are treated as though they do not exist. They may observe the world but not interact with it. On a result of 1-3, the caster suffers a random chaos effect.

name: Unhittable
description: Caster surrounds themselves with tempestuous energy and turns away attacks with impeccable accuracy. After an attack roll is made against them, the caster rolls a d6. Should the roll be 4 or above, the attack misses, even if it were to otherwise hit.

name: Uplift
description: A whirlwind of air violently pushes targets inside the area 10' upward. So long as targets remain within the area, they have two displaced rolls on all AGI checks/saves and are slowed.

name: Vernal Defense
description: Caster infuses the targets with energy. Willing targets lose their movement action, cannot be moved by magical or mundane means, lose their ability to perform AGI checks, and their movement DVs, but they gain 22 + 1/2F armor DVs. This spell cannot be dropped until it's duration expires.

name: Vigor
description: Caster surrounds the bodies of the targets in an aura of force. Targets of this spell gain an exceptional HEA and an exceptional STR and increase their size categories by 1.

name: Vigilance
description: In response to an attack roll being made against anyone within 10'+ 10'/F of the effigy - the effigy can interpose - shoving the target behind them as it moves. The attack roll is made against the effigy instead of the target.

name: Unbound
description:
An aura of pure energy surrounds the target until the end of their next turn. Caster allows the target to alter their next spell with an area. 
If the spell's range is a line, it is instead a cone with half range 
If the spell's range is a cone, it is instead a 5' wide line with double range. 
If the spell's range is a radius, it is instead a cylinder with half the radius and double the height. 
If the spell's range is a cylinder, it is instead a sphere with the same radius.

name: Voltspike
description: Caster fires an arc of lightning from their fingertips, making a ranged attack roll and inflicting (Rank/2)d10 of lightning damage to the target on hit.

name: Wane
description: Caster shrouds a willing target in celestial twilight. All of the target spells are finessed against a certain category of the caster's choosing twice. The caster saves 1 + 1/4F mana on each spell they cast, and they gain Elemental / Magic Damage Reduction 2. When finessing against a category, the category gets weaker in proportion to how much it would have gotten stronger. This effect will downgrade the spell to the next lowest increment if it is any fractional quantity.

name: Warp Lightning
description: Caster binds magical air to themselves. While bound by this force, each time a target fails a save/check associated with an aeromancy spell or is successfully struck by an attack roll emanating from aeromancy the target is forcibly pushed to a new location within 40' of their original location (Chosen by the caster.)

name: Warp Bolt
description: Caster launches a bolt of energy in a straight line originating from themselves. Targets receive 8d10 +1/F adaptive damage and are forcibly teleported to an unoccupied space of the caster's choice within this spell's area of effect. AGI save for halve damage and negate being teleported. This spell also affects inanimate objects.

name: Verdure Movement
description: Caster may use plantlife to maneuver, allowing themselves to use plantlife to lift to lift or catch them, should they be falling. They are not slowed by plants, and walls of plants will move out of the way of the caster. Movement speed in areas with dense plantlife is increased by 30' + 10'/2F. While in the presence of dense plantlife, caster has 1 + 1/4F placed rolls on any AGI checks. Plants are no longer hostile to the caster, causing them to ignore spells such as Destructive Verdance or Entangle.

name: Warpspace
description: Spatial energies warp the area, allowing for teleportation. Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a swift action during all later turns the caster may swap the positions of two targets in the area.

name: Waterlog
description: Caster condenses water into a cone, saturating all targets, soaking water into their armor, clothes, and body until they struggle to move. Targets who fail an AGI save are slowed until the end of their next turn, and lose half of their movement DVs while slowed by Waterlog or any other source (Of slow) for the next minute.

name: Wax
description: Caster shrouds a willing target in celestial twilight. The spells they cast are finessed 1 + 1/4F in a direction of their choice. Immediately upon casting this spell and then as a Swift Action on subsequent turns, caster gains a placed roll on PWR checks.

name: Whirlpool
description: A torrent of water collects at the target location in a whirlpool, dragging everyone as close to the center as possible and pinning them, and inflicting 1 + 1/4F d10 blunt per target in the whirlpool's center, STR check to negate. Affected targets can re-attempt with a core action, using their swim speed upon breaking.

name: Water Control
description:
Immediately upon casting this spell, and then as a Swift Action during all later turns the caster can use one of the following abilities. 
Suspend and control the volume of water up to the spell's area and change it by moving it 10' + 10'/F. 
Use water to attack a target within the range and inflict 4 + 1/4F d8 blunt damage with an AGI save for half and negate being slowed until the end of their next turn. 
Evaporate a volume of water equal to half the area. 
Condense a volume of water equal to half the area 
Heat up or cool down water equal to the volume, up to a point where the water can damage, inflicting 2d8 fire or ice damage at the end of the caster's turn to those in the water.

name: Wild Growth
description: Plant life begins to erupt at the target area. All characters are slowed and receive a displaced roll on AGI check and saves while moving through the area.

name: Willing Sacrifice
description: As a reaction to an attack roll or single-target spell, the caster may use this ability to redirect it to a willing target. The willing target becomes the new target for the ability.

name: Witch's Power
description: Caster inspires a magically enhanced fervor in a number of willing targets, providing them 2 + 1/4F placed rolls on all resistance checks as well an exceptional PWR. If cast on an unwilling target, they instead have 1 + 1/2F displaced rolls on the setting of all resistance checks, WIL save to negate.

name: Wind Wall
description: This spell creates a swirling wall of air. Projectiles moving through the wind wall remove 3 dice from their attack roll. Targets moving through the wall make a STR or AGI check (target's choice) and on a failure stop moving, lose all remaining movement, and fall prone. Caster can move the wall 10' in any direction as a Swift Action.

name: Wormhole
description: Caster generates a shimmering, translucent purple portal somewhere in the LOS and a second identical looking portal at another target location in the target LOS. Anything that moves through either portal comes out of the other portal. If a target is forced into or through a portal in any fashion they have an AGI save to negate being shoved from one portal to the other.

name: Water Wall
description: Caster erects a wave of water that acts as a wall, standing 10' + 5'/F tall. Projectiles moving through the water wall have their total damage halved. Targets moving through the wall make a STR or AGI check (target's choice) and on failure stop moving, losing all remaining movement. When the wall is hit with ice damage, it is frozen. If the wall is frozen, it is impossible to see or move through the wall. A frozen wall has 30 HP and 0 DVs.

name: Wolf / Bear
description: Caster transforms into a Duskhunter or Elemental Bear.

name: Zap
description: Caster teleports LOS 10' + 5'/F inflicting 1 + 1/2F d10 lightning damage to all targets within 5' of the caster upon arrival.

name: Zephyr
description: Caster creates a massive gust that can move people, objects, blow away clouds, and snuff out a house-sized fire. Objects up to 40 + 5/F lbs can be moved up to 60' per round in the direction of the airflow. Targets are pushed 20' in the direction of the gust and knocked prone at the end of each of the caster's turns, STR check to negate. Caster can change the direction of the zephyr as a Swift Action.

name: Vortex
description: Caster crafts a 70' tall vortex with a move speed of 60', though it disperses if it leaves the LOS. If the caster does not direct the vortex it remains stationary. If the vortex hits a target they must make an AGI or STR save (their choice). If failed, they are flung to the top and carried with the vortex, falling at the start of their turn. Falling will typically cause targets to take 7d6 blunt damage. If cast centered on themselves, the caster may ride the vortex to the top, staying there. The caster can control the vortex's movement utilizing their Swift Action.

name: Form Familiar
description:
To create a familiar, the caster fractures a piece of their soul and concentrates it into a small rock or gemstone of some kind, this fusion creates an obedient pet that can take a variety of forms.  The familiar’s form must be of size category small. By default familiars only have 5HP, a land speed of 20’, and have an attack that does 1d4 damage in any chosen damage type.  Familiars must breathe water or air and be either nocturnal or diurnal.  Familiars have telepathic communication with their masters, though they cannot speak or learn language, and will follow simple commands. At the following ranks they gain upgrades….
Rank 2: As a Swift Action caster loses all their senses but gains the senses of their familiar.  This ability is maintained with focus.
Rank: 4:  The familiar can now either have a swim speed of 15’, fly speed of 15’, or a land speed of 30’.
Rank: 6: The familiar can be teleported anywhere within LOS of the caster as a Swift Action. The familiar can also be used as a point of casting all spells.
Rank: 8: The familiar can now have two kinds of movement (outlined in Rank 4 upgrade).
Rank: 10: The familiar can now be of the Tiny or Medium size class as well.
If the familiar dies, the soul rushes back to its other half and with it comes the last minute of memories the familiar had.  The familiar’s form does not need to stay consistent across summonings but once summoned that form is considered permanent until they are reformed.  The familiar can be reformed at any time and will have the memories of all past familiar forms.
